<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Hello World! </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>When you first made the computer
to print the sentence <span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Hello World!</span>,
you felt so happy, not knowing how complex and interesting the world of
programming and algorithm will turn out to be. Then you did not know anything
about loops, so to print 7 lines of Hello World!, you just had to copy and
paste some lines. If you were intelligent enough, you could make a code that
prints Hello World! 7 times, using just 3 paste commands. Note that we are
not interested about the number of copy commands required. A simple program
that prints Hello World! is shown in Figure 1. By copying the single print
statement and pasting it we get a program that prints two Hello World! lines.
Then copying these two print statements and pasting them, we get a program that
prints four Hello World! lines. Then copying three of these four statements
and pasting them we can get a program that prints seven Hello World! lines
(Figure 4). So three pastes commands are needed in total and Of course you are
not allowed to delete any line after pasting. Given the number of Hello
World! lines you need to print, you will have to find out the minimum number
of pastes required to make that program from the origin program shown in Figure
1.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.75pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=162 valign=top style='width:121.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;padding:0in 1.45pt 0in 1.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><img width=157 height=59
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11636a.jpg" ></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=161 valign=top style='width:121.1pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><img width=156 height=70
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11636a.jpg" ></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=162 valign=top style='width:121.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><img width=157 height=91
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11636a.jpg" ></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=161 valign=top style='width:120.55pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 1.45pt 0in 1.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><img width=151 height=122
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11636a.jpg" ></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=162 valign=top style='width:121.5pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  padding:0in 1.45pt 0in 1.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Figure 1</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=161 valign=top style='width:121.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Figure 2</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=162 valign=top style='width:121.5pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Figure3</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=161 valign=top style='width:120.55pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 1.45pt 0in 1.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Figure 4</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'> </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file can contain up to
2000 lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;10001) that
denotes the number of Hello World! lines are required to be printed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'> </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
containing a negative integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input except the
last one, produce one line of output of the form Case X: Y where X is the
serial of output and Y denotes the minimum number of paste commands required to
make a program that prints N lines of Hello World!.  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>&nbsp;</span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>&nbsp;</span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input                             Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.75pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>-1</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=338 valign=top style='width:253.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 4</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

o\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
w\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
.shape {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
</style>
<![endif]-->

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074">

 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Garbage Remembering Exam</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Little Tim is now a graduate,
and is thinking about higher studies. However, he first needs to appear in an
exam whose preparation alone includes memorizing the meanings of over 3500
words!</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>After going through the list a
few times, however, he sees trouble  he can remember all the word-meanings as
long as they keep coming in the same order. When quizzed in random order,
however, he is at a complete loss. So, as any decent programmer would, he
writes a random shuffler to help him quiz himself.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>To his dismay, however, he
finds that words that were near each other in the original list quite often end
up being close together in the shuffled list as well. He does not like this at
all, and suspects that his random shuffler may have some kind of a bug. But
before he recodes his shuffler he wants your help to make sure that the
shuffler is indeed faulty.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>So he is asking for your help
in determining how likely such events are even if the list is indeed getting
completely randomly shuffled, and even if his program is working perfectly.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Given the size of the list <i>N</i>,
and a proximity factor <i>K</i>, you are to determine the expected number of <i>wasted
words</i> in a shuffled list assuming that all possible shufflings are equally
likely. Informally, two words are considered <i>wasted</i> if they appear at a
distance less than or equal to <i>K</i> in both the lists. Assume that the
original list is <i>cyclical</i> and shuffled list is <i>linear </i>(non-cyclical).
</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Formally, let us suppose that
two words A and B have indices <i>o<sub>a</sub></i> and <i>o<sub>b</sub></i> in
the original list and indices <i>s<sub>a</sub></i> and <i>s<sub>b</sub></i> in
the shuffled list, respectively (all indices are 0-based). Then both the words
are considered <i>wasted</i> if:</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:84.75pt;
 height:22.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=113 height=30
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1026" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310405609">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:308.25pt;height:22.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=411 height=30
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1027" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310405610">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of a series
of cases. Each case consists of two integers <i>N</i> and <i>K</i> on a single
line. You may assume that 1<span style='font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"DejaVu Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:"DejaVu Sans"'>&#8804;</span>K<span
style='font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
mso-bidi-font-family:"DejaVu Sans"'>&#8804;</span>N<span style='font-family:
"DejaVu Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:"DejaVu Sans"'>&#8804;</span>100000.
Input is terminated by a line containing two 0s, and has at most 125 lines of
input.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Output one
line for each test case except the last one. Each line of output should be of
the form Case X: Y, where X is the serial number of output and Y is<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>the expected number of wasted words in the
shuffled list, printed with exactly four digits after the decimal point, with
rounding if necessary.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>5 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 5.0000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 3.5000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<head>
<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
<meta name=Generator content="Microsoft Word 11 (filtered)">
<title>Problem C</title>

<style>
<!--

	{margin-top:0in;

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Temperature
Monitoring</span></b><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'> </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>We have a device to monitor
temperature. After configuring it, we place it inside the chamber whose
temperature we wish to monitor. The device is equipped with four alarms each of
which can be configured differently. The Alarms are identified by the numbers
1, 2, 3 and 4.  The device takes a reading of its surrounding at a regular
interval.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this problem you will be
simulating the behavior of such a device.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input contains
a positive integer <b>T&lt;101, </b>which denotes the number of test cases.
Each case consists of several lines which are described below.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'>The
first line contains a positive integer <b>M, </b>which denotes the measurement
interval. That is, the device takes a reading every <b>M </b>seconds.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'>The
second line contains a non-negative integer <b>S</b>, which denotes the
Startup delay. This is the amount of time that the device will remain idle
after placing inside the chamber before it takes its first reading. The device
will instantly take a reading when the Startup delay ends. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'>The
third line contains four integers. The integers give the threshold temperature
for alarm 1,2,3,4 respectively. Here threshold temperature means, when a
recorded temperature crosses this temperature the corresponding alarm will be
triggered.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'>The
fourth line contains a non-negative integer <b>C</b>. The least significant 8
bits of this integer represents the configurations of the four alarms. The
rightmost 4 bits (bit 0 to 3) determine if the alarms are enabled(bit value 1)
or disabled(bit value 0). For example, if the bits are set as 0011, this means
Alarm 1 and 2 are enabled and Alarm 3 and 4 are disabled. If an alarm is
disabled, it will never be triggered.</p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:.65pt'>The next 4
bits(bits 4 to 7) determine the triggering type of each alarm. A value of 0
means, its a low trigger and a value of 1 means its a high trigger. For
example, if the bits are set as 1100, this means Alarm 1 and 2 are set for low
trigger and Alarm 3 and 4 for high trigger. Here high trigger means if a
recorded temperature is above the set threshold temperature for an alarm, it
will be triggered. Similarly, a Low trigger means if a recorded temperature is
below the set threshold temperature for an alarm, that alarm will be triggered.
</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The fifth line contains a
positive integer <b>K&lt;=100</b>. The following <b>K</b> lines contain
a                        pair of integers each in the format <b>time temp. </b>Here
<b>time</b> represents the duration of a period with constant temperature and <b>temp</b>
indicates the temperature of the environment in that period. Note that, time is
always positive. The time value of first pair indicates the period immediately
following the placement of the device inside the environment to be monitored.
Successive time values indicate the duration of periods in the order they
occur. The temperature at the border regions is considered to be that of the
period just ending. Also, the temperature at the very beginning is that of the
first period. Every value in the input will fit in 32 bit signed integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case of input, there
will be one line of output. It will first contain the case number, followed by
the triggering status of each of the four alarms. The triggering status will
contain four strings of either yes or no, separated by a space. The first
string will be yes if alarm 1 was triggered at least once and no otherwise. The
second string will be the status of alarm 2 and so on. Look at the sample
output for exact formatting.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input                             Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.25pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5
  10 15 20</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>15</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5
  15</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5
  10 15 20</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>7</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10
  15</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 20</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: no no no yes</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: no no no no</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<title>Problem D</title>
<style>

 /* List Definitions */
 ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}

	{margin-bottom:0in;}

</style>

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Guard the Land</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Farmer Latif has a rectangular
shaped land of 100 meter width and 100 meter height. Any point in this land can
be defined as (x, y) where x is the distance of the point from left side of the
land and y is the distance of the point from bottom side. So lower left corner
of the land is (0, 0) and upper right corner of the land is (100, 100).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Every night Latif hires two
guards to guard his crop in the land. A guard can guard a rectangular shaped
region. Any guard has some limitation of area to guard. The guard might not be
able to guard the whole land. So every night Latif defines two rectangular
regions for two guards to be guarded by them. The sides of this rectangular
region are parallel to the sides of the Latifs land. He defines the region for
guards by four integers x1, y1, x2, y2. Here (x1, y1) is the lower left corner
of the region and (x2, y2) is the upper right corner of the region.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The region which is guarded by
two guards is considered strongly secured, the region which is guarded by
exactly one guard is weakly secured, and the region which is guarded by no
guard is unsecured.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this problem, you have to find
the area of strongly secured region, weakly secured region and unsecured region
in <sub><img width=53 height=20 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11639a.gif" ></sub> for every
night.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will start with a line
having a positive integer N(<sub><img width=60 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11639a.gif" ></sub>), the number of nights Latif hires guards.
For each of the N nights, there are two lines in input, first one defines the
region of first guard and the second one defines the region of second guard.
Each of this line will contain four integers x1, y1, x2, y2 (<sub><img
width=235 height=18 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11639a.gif" ></sub>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each land you have to output
one line, giving the night number followed by three integers: Area of strongly
secured region, area of weakly secured region and area of unsecured region of
Latifs land. See sample output for exact format.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>&nbsp;</span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>&nbsp;</span></b></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input                             Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.75pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 10 20 20</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>15 15 25 25</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 10 20 20</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20 20 30 30</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=338 valign=top style='width:253.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Night 1: 25 150 9825</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Night 2: 0 200 9800</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 2.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;border:none;
padding:0in'>The picture above depicts the first sample input<img width=624
height=394 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11639a.gif"  align=left></p>

</div>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Mayor Election</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s2051" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:490.55pt;margin-top:11.15pt;width:147.55pt;
 height:247.3pt;z-index:2;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:right' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="left"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=197 height=330
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  align=right v:shapes="_x0000_s2051"><![endif]></p>

<p class=Text-body style='margin-right:85.5pt'>Somewhere in this universe,
there is a city named <em>Shohor</em>. The people of <em>Shohor</em> are very democratic
in nature. They will be holding their mayor election in a few months. So, all
the mayor candidates are starting their campaign. All the candidates wanted to
use posters in their campaigns, so they requested the election commission (EC) to
permit them to put posters. After a long discussion, the election commission
decided that, the candidates will be permitted to put posters along the road <em>SAH
Shoroni</em>. But, the number of posters a particular candidate can place, is
limited by the commission. </p>

<p class=First-line-indent style='margin-right:85.5pt;text-indent:0in'>All the posters
are of size 1meter-by-1meter. The posters have to be placed side-by-side, so,
if someone puts <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:14.25pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1026" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406527">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>posters, they will
take <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:14.25pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1027" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406528">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>meters along the road.
</p>

<p class=First-line-indent style='margin-right:85.5pt;text-indent:0in'>Total
length of <em>SAH Shoroni</em> is <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12.75pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=17 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1028" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406529">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>meters. The candidates
(and also the <em>EC</em>) want to use every inch of the road. So, the total
number of posters along the road will always be the length of the road.
Although, every candidate should be given permission to place same number of
posters, some of them are very influential, and somehow managed to change the
number of posters they can place (I said they were democratic, I never
mentioned whether they were corrupt or not). For each candidate, the commission
has decided that, he will be given a region of length at least <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:11.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=15 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1029" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406530">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and at most <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1030" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406531">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>. But no matter, how
long, each candidate is allowed to cover with posters, they all sum up to the length
of the road. </p>

<p class=First-line-indent style='margin-right:85.5pt;text-indent:0in'>The
Election Commission Office is at one end of the road. So, any position in the
road can be described the its distance from the office. Each candidate will be
given a region <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1031" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:38.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=51 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1031" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406532">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>so that, he can place
his posters in between this region. For all the candidates, the regions are
non-overlapping, and completely covers the road. </p>

<p class=First-line-indent style='margin-right:85.5pt;text-indent:0in'>All the
candidates have a number of different posters. If people see same posters over
and over, it will become boring to them, so, they decided that, for any poster <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1032" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=20 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1032" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406533">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>, it can be showed at
most <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1033" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:13.5pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=18 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1033"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1033" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406534">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>times, consecutively. </p>

<p class=First-line-indent style='margin-right:85.5pt;text-indent:0in'>No two
candidates have same poster(Duh! obviously. You wont expect anyone to campaign
for his opponent!). </p>

<p class=WW-First-line-indent style='margin-right:85.5pt;text-indent:0in'>The
citizen of <em>Shohor</em> knows the length of the road. They also know, that,
the EC will permit <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1034" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:16.5pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=22 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1034"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1034" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406535">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>candidate to place at
least <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1035" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:14.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1035"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1035" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406536">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>posters and at most <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1036" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1036"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1036" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406537">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>posters. The
assignments of the regions will be done accordingly, that means, the posters
nearest to the Election Commission office, will belong to candidate 1, then
next region will belong to the candidate 2, and so on. Help the citizen of <i>Shohor</i>
find the number of different poster sequence they will see. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=Text-body style='margin-right:85.5pt'>First line of input will contain
an integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1037" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:12.75pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=17 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1037"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1037" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406538">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1038" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1038"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1038" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406539">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->), the number of test cases. This will be followed by <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1039" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12.75pt;height:13.5pt'
 o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=17 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1039"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1039" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406540">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>test cases, each
preceded by a blank line. Each test case, starts with an integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1040" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:13.5pt'
 o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1040"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1040" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406541">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1041" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:39pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=52 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1041"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1041" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406542">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->), the number of mayoral candidates. This will be followed by
<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1042" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;
 height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1042"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1042" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406543">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>lines, each describing
a candidate. Each candidate description will start with three integers, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1043" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15.75pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=21 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1043"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1043" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406544">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape

src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1044"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  ShapeID="_x0000_i1044" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406545">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->) ,<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1045" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:11.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>

</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=15 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1045"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  ShapeID="_x0000_i1045" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406546">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--> and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1046"

  ShapeID="_x0000_i1046" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406547">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape

 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->), the number of different posters, the minimum number of
posters, he will be allowed to place, and the maximum number of posters he will
be allowed. This will be followed by <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1048"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15.75pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>

</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=21 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1048"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1048" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406549">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>integers, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1049" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=20 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1049"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1049" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406550">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1050" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:54pt;height:15pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=72 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1050"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1050" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406551">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->) , the maximum number of times, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1051" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:18pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=24 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1051"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1051" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406553">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>poster can be placed
consecutively. After that, an integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1052"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1052"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1052" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406554">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1053" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:68.25pt;height:13.5pt'
 o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=91 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1053"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1053" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406555">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->) describes the number of queries to handle. Each of the
following <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1054" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:14.25pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1054"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1054" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406556">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>lines each contain an
integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1055" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:12.75pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=17 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1055"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1055" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406557">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1056" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:82.5pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole=" 
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=110 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1056"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="opendocument.MathDocument.1"
  ShapeID="_x0000_i1056" DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1310406558">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->) , the length of the road. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=Text-body style='margin-right:85.5pt;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each
query, output the number of ways to cover the road with posters completely. The
answer can be really large. So, answer all number modulo 786433, which is also
a prime number. For exact formats please see the sample input output. There
will be a blank line after each test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Looking
for a New Place</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s2051" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:5.6pt;width:184.45pt;height:98.95pt;
 z-index:-1;mso-wrap-distance-left:9.05pt;mso-wrap-distance-right:9.05pt;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=246 height=132
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s2051"><![endif]>It
has been just over three months since <i>SH</i> and <i>TR</i> got married and
they are already grossed out living at their current place. All the day-to-day
hassles, crowds, nastiness and anxiety of living in the thick of things are now
simply unendurable!<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Its high time that
they looked for a new place in the suburban area where everything is quiet and
peaceful.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There was a recent ad in the
newspaper by the New-Couple Placement Company (NCPC) that is offering cheap
plots just outside the city. <i>TR</i>, being the decision maker of the family,
has contacted one of the brokers of NCPC and has shown interest to buy a new
piece of land.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The broker has provided
them with the details of available spaces from which they can choose their
desired plot.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The area under the possession of
NCPC can be modeled as a rectangular grid of size <b>N x M</b>. Each cell of
the grid is either empty or blocked. Empty cells represent available spaces and
the blocked ones are those that are already bought by some other party. <i>SH</i>
and <i>TR</i> have got a budget that is big enough for buying <b>K</b> empty
cells. <b>K</b> can have a maximum value of 6, thanks to straitened
circumstances that <i>SH</i> and <i>TR</i> are presently in. All the <b>K</b>
empty cells that will be bought by them have to be connected pair-wise. Two
cells are connected if you can start from one and reach the other passing
through only cells bought by you. You can move 4 ways  north, east, south and
west.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>How many ways can you select <b>K</b>
cells that satisfies the above conditions?</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b>Example: <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Courier New"'>.#.<br>
...<br>
##.<br>
..#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Consider the grid above where the
dimension is <b>4 x 3</b> and <b>K</b> = 3. Dots(<b>.</b>) represent empty
cells and hashes(<b>#</b>) represent occupied cells.</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=91 valign=top style='width:.95in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>B#.<br>
  BB.<br>
  ##.<br>
  ..#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=91 valign=top style='width:.95in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>.#.<br>
  BBB<br>
  ##.<br>
  ..#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=91 valign=top style='width:.95in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>.#B<br>
  .BB<br>
  ##.<br>
  ..#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=91 valign=top style='width:.95in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>.#.<br>
  .BB<br>
  ##B<br>
  ..#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=91 valign=top style='width:.95in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>.#B<br>
  ..B<br>
  ##B<br>
  ..#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There are 5 ways to buy 3 cells,
as shown above. B indicates the bought cells!</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h5>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h5>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input is an
integer T(T&lt;100) that gives you the number of test cases. Each case starts
with a line containing 3 integers in the order N, M and K. 1 &#8804; N, M &#8804;
1000 and 1 &#8804; K &#8804; 6. The meanings of these variables are mentioned
above. The next line contains an integer X(0&#8804;X&#8804;100) that indicates
the number of cells that are blocked. The next line gives X pairs of integers
in the order R<sub>1</sub> C<sub>1</sub> R<sub>2</sub> C<sub>2</sub> R<sub>3</sub>
C<sub>3</sub> 
 R<sub>X</sub> C<sub>X</sub>. Each pair, R<sub>i</sub> C<sub>i</sub>,
gives the coordinate of a cell that is blocked. All these pairs will have
distinct coordinates and will be inside the grid. <br>
Top-Left corner of the grid has a coordinate of (1, 1) and that of bottom right
has a coordinate of (N, M).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each case,
output the case number first followed by the required result.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>4 3 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 1 3 2 4 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>10 10 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char;
  text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=338 valign=top style='width:253.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 99<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

 /* List Definitions */
 @list l0
	{mso-list-id:1;
	mso-list-template-ids:1;}
@list l0:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-suffix:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:0in;
	text-indent:0in;}
@list l0:level2
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-suffix:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:0in;
	text-indent:0in;}

	{mso-level-number-format:none;

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
