 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><st1:country-region w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on"><b><span
  style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Bangladesh</span></b></st1:place></st1:country-region><b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Premier
League</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>
</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>So, here comes another cricket tournament  <st1:country-region
w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Bangladesh</st1:place></st1:country-region>
Premier League aka BPL. In this tournament, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b> teams play against each other in a round-robin league fashion for
a total of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>R</b> rounds. Team with
highest number of wins is announced the winner of the tournament. If there are
multiple teams with highest number of wins, then all of them are winners. Now,
we are in the middle of a tournament and would like to determine which of the
teams are mathematically out of the league race. In other words, we would like
to determine which teams cannot win the tournament even if they win all of
their remaining matches.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>You are given the current league table of the tournament.
For example, lets say there 4 teams in the tournament  Dhaka, <st1:City
w:st="on">Chittagong</st1:City>, Rajshahi and <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Khulna</st1:place></st1:City>. A sample table can be like this  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span>Team<span
style='mso-tab-count:2'>                        </span>Wins<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>    </span> Loss<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>    </span>Left<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>     </span> Dhk<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>    </span>Ctg
<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>     </span>Raj<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>       </span>Khl</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  
</span>-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span><st1:place w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place><span
style='mso-tab-count:2'>                       </span> 6<span style='mso-tab-count:
1'>         </span>7<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span> 5<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>         </span>0<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>5</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span><st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>   </span>10<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>        </span>4<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>4<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>4<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span>Rajshahi<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>       </span>10<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>        </span>4<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>4<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>4<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span><st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Khulna</st1:place></st1:City><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>         </span>1<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>12<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>        </span>5<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>5<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span>0</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>From the table, you can see that <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Khulna</st1:place></st1:City> is definitely not in the league race.
They have won 1 match and can only win 5 more which would be insufficient to
pass <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City>
or Rajshahi. On the other hand, <st1:place w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place> is also
eliminated though it may not be evident from the table. <st1:place w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place>
has won 6 matches and can win 5 more making a total of 11. Now <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Chittagong</st1:place></st1:City> and Rajshahi have won a total of
10+10 = 20 matches and they will play each other 4 more times. So, on the
average, they will win (20+4) / 2 = 12 matches. So, one team would definitely
win more than 11 matches thereby eliminating <st1:place w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will consist of less than
30 test cases. First line of each test case will contain no of teams in the
tournament, N (1&lt;N&lt;51). Then there will be a table in the format
mentioned above except for the headers. It will consist of N rows and N+4
columns. Each row will represent a team. Team names dont have any spaces in
them and they will be at most 30 characters in length. Last N columns of the
table constitute the Remaining Game Matrix which is symmetrical and its
diagonal entries are always zero. No. of rounds, R (0&lt;R&lt;31)<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>will not be explicitly mentioned in the
statement. The last test case will be followed by a -1 in a line by itself,
denoting the end of input file.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, you should print Case C: in the first
line where C is replaced by the case number starting from 1. Then, for each team
eliminated, you should output a block of 5 lines which should be in the
following format </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Team X is eliminated.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>They can win at most a + b = c games.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>T<sub>1</sub>, T<sub>2</sub>, 
 and T<sub>n</sub>
have won a total of G games.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>They play each other M times.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>So, on average, each of the teams wins (G+M)/n = p
games which is greater than c.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Here,</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>X is the name of the team which is eliminated.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>a, b and c are the no. of games team X has already won, no.
of remaining games and their total wins optimistically respectively.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>T<sub>1</sub>, T<sub>2</sub>, 
 and T<sub>n </sub>are the n
team names you think will mathematically beat team X as a combination. G is
their total match won already. There will be M matches between these n teams.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Print a blank line after each such block. Print an extra
blank line after each test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>If there are multiple groups that satisfy the condition, you
can output any one. Also you can output teams in any order. Output will be
checked by a special judge program. For floating point number (only p), you can
print any number of digits after the decimal point provided it does not differ
by more than 1E-6 from the original value.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.0pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>A 6 7 5 0 0 0 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>B 10 4 4 0 0 4 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>C 10 4 4 0 4 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>D 1 12 5 5 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>A 1 1 1 0 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  lang=EN-MY style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-MY;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>B 1 1 1 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  lang=EN-MY style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN-MY;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>-1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>Case 1:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>Team A is eliminated.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>They can win at most 6 + 5 = 11 games.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>B and C have won a total of 20 games.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>They play each other 4 times.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>So, on average, each of the teams wins (20+4)/2 =
  12.000000 games which is greater than 11.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>Team D is eliminated.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>They can win at most 1 + 5 = 6 games.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>B have won a total of 10 games.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>They play each other 0 times.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>So, on average, each of the teams wins (10+0)/1 =
  10.000000 games which is greater than 6.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY

  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'>Case 2:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span lang=EN-MY
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-MY'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>[the line above is blank]<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Note:
Though the output blocks are supposed to be of 5 lines, you see in the sample
output to span them to 7 lines which is due to formatting in word. You should
output in 5 lines on your output. <!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s2050" style='width:480.05pt;height:1.5pt;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:char;mso-position-vertical-relative:line;
 v-text-anchor:middle' fillcolor="#aca899" stroked="f">
 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=640 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image001.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_s2050"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><![endif]--><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:480.05pt;height:1.5pt'/><span
style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

</div>

</body>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Knight Tour</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In the game of chess in 8 x 8
grid a knight can move in an interesting way. Its moves are like L shape. A knight
can move from cell (r1, c1) to cell (r2, c2) if and only if (r1 - r2)<sup>2</sup>
+ (c1 - c2)<sup>2</sup> = 5.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For this problem consider a grid
of size <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N x N</b>.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>There are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>K </b>interesting cell in our grid. We have a knight which can start
his journey from any cell it likes in the grid. His aim is to visit all
interesting cells at least once and back to its initial position.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Your task is to calculate the
minimum number of moves required for the knight to finish its journey.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:88.5pt;
 height:88.5pt' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/h_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=118 height=118
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/h_files/image001.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>Image: knight moves</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will start with an integer
T(T&#8804;100) which denotes the number of test cases. Each case starts with
two integers N(4&#8804;N&#8804;1000) and K(1&#8804;K&#8804;16). Each of the
next K lines contains two integers R(1&#8804;R&#8804;N) and C(1&#8804;C&#8804;N).
Here (R, C) represents an interesting cell.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>Output one line for each test case. Print the case number
followed by the number of minimum moves required. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Look at the
sample input output for exact format.</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.0pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8
  3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>6 7<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 12<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="2"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Pyragrid</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The great innovators of the great
pyramid have another great new idea. They are now planning to build pyragrids 
number of pyramid like stuffs assorted on a grid. What makes it even more interesting
is the item they are making the grid with  bamboo. They have a huge field that
can be treated as a 2D Cartesian plane. Let's assume the lower left corner of
the field has co-ordinate (-100, -100) while the upper right corner is (100,
100). A number of bamboo sticks (You can safely assume that even on that land
of ideas, none has tried the weird idea of bending a bamboo stick. So, the
sticks will be always straight) are placed on this field. There are two
mechanical restrictions which must be met while placing bamboos. Firstly, the
endpoint of a bamboo stick must be put on a grid point. Second, the sticks must
be either lie parallel or form a 45 degree angle with one of the axes. These
sticks intersect at different points and form a criss-crossed grid of irregular
shaped cells. By the way, two bamboo sticks can overlap i.e. one stick can be
placed on top of another one. I forgot to tell you, these new pyargrids have
triangle shaped base, unlike the square shaped bases of the original pyramid.
So, you can build a pyragrid on a cell only if the cell has triangular shape.
You need to determine the number of possible cells on the grid where a pyragrid
can be built. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:0in'>First line of each
test case contains an integer N (1&lt;=N&lt;=100), the number of bamboo sticks.
Each of the next N lines has 4 integers, x1, y1, x2 &amp; y2
(-100&lt;=x1,y1,x2,y2&lt;=100), where (x1,y1) are the co-ordinates of one end
point of the bamboo stick while (x2,y2) are that of the other end. A stick will
have length greater than 0. The end of input will be denoted by a case with N =
0. This case should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;tab-stops:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For every test
case except the last one, print one line of the form Case X: Y, where X is
the serial of output (starting from 1) and Y is the number of possible unique
cells where a pyragrid can be placed.</p>

<span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
EN-US;mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all
style='mso-special-character:line-break;page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                          
</span>Output for Sample Inputs<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 0 5 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 0 5 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 5 5 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 0 2 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1 1 3 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 0 2 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1 1 2 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 2 2 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:SutonnyMJ;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
display:none;mso-hide:all'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem J</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Bits</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A <b>bit</b> is a binary digit,
taking a logical value of either &quot;1&quot; or &quot;0&quot; (also referred
to as &quot;true&quot; or &quot;false&quot; respectively).  And every decimal
number has a binary representation which is actually a series of bits. If a bit
of a number is 1 and it's next bit is also 1 then we can say that the
number has a 1 adjacent bit. And you have to find out how many times this
scenario occurs for all numbers up to <b>N</b>. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Examples:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>            Number           Binary                         Adjacent
Bits</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>            12                    1100                            1</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>            15                    1111                            3</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>            27                    11011                          2</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, you are given
an integer number (0 &lt;= N &lt;= ((2^63)-2)), as described in the statement.
The last test case is followed by a negative integer in a line by itself,
denoting the end of input file.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For every test case, print a line
of the form Case X: Y, where X is the serial of output (starting from 1) and
Y is the cumulative summation of all adjacent bits from 0 to N.</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>&nbsp;</span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input                             Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.25pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>15</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>21</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>22</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>-1</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 0</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 12</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  4: 13</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  5: 13</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 6: 14</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:Wingdings;
	panose-1:5 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0;
	mso-font-charset:2;
	mso-generic-font-family:auto;
	mso-font-pitch:variable;
	mso-font-signature:0 268435456 0 0 -2147483648 0;}

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Athletics
  Track<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>London Olympics is approaching
very shortly  in just 3 years. Three years might not sound as that small a
time to say just, but it is indeed for those who have to organize the competition.
There are so many things to do  preparing the venues, building the Olympic
village for accommodating athletes and officials, improving the transportation
of the entire city as the venues are located all over the city and also there
will be great number of tourists / spectators during the Olympics. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t202"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="202" path="m,l,21600r21600,l21600,xe">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:path gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1031" type="#_x0000_t202" style='position:absolute;
 margin-left:0;margin-top:4.95pt;width:248.2pt;height:180.7pt;z-index:2;
 mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;mso-position-horizontal:left'
 stroked="f">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:textbox inset="0,0,0,0">
  <![if !mso]>
  <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 width="100%">
   <tr>
    <td><![endif]>
    <div>
    <p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-fareast-language:
    EN-US'><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75"
     o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
     <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
     <v:formulas>
      <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
      <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
      <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
      <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
      <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
      <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
      <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
      <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
      <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
      <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
      <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
      <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
     </v:formulas>
     <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
     <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
    </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:249pt;
     height:2in' filled="t">
     <v:fill color2="black"/>
     <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/a_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
    </v:shape></span><span
    style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Geometric
    Model</p>
    </div>
    <![if !mso]></td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <![endif]></v:textbox>
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=335 height=245
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/a_files/image001.jpg"  align=left
alt="Text Box:                               Geometric Model" v:shapes="_x0000_s1031"><![endif]><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin;mso-field-lock:yes'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>\* MERGEFORMAT <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_s1046" type="#_x0000_t202" style='width:236.95pt;height:171.85pt;
 mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:char;mso-position-vertical-relative:line'
 stroked="f">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:textbox inset="0,0,0,0">
  <![if !mso]>
  <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 width="100%">
   <tr>
    <td><![endif]>
    <div>
    <p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-fareast-language:
    EN-US'><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:237pt;
     height:150pt' filled="t">
     <v:fill color2="black"/>
     <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/a_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
    </v:shape></span><span
    style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Actual View</p>
    </div>
    <![if !mso]></td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <![endif]></v:textbox>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=320 height=234
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/a_files/image001.jpg" 
alt="Text Box:                               Actual View" v:shapes="_x0000_s1046"><![endif]><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:236.95pt;height:171.85pt'>
 <v:imagedata croptop="-65520f" cropbottom="65520f"/>
</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>One of the most important tasks
is to build the stadium. You are appointed as a programmer to help things out
in certain matters  more specifically in designing and building the athletics
tracks. After some study, you find out that athletics tracks have a general
shape of a rectangle with two sliced circles on two ends. Now the turf that is
placed inside this rectangle is prepared elsewhere and comes in different
shapes  different length to width ratios. You know one thing for certain 
your track should have a perimeter of 400 meters. Thats the standard length
for athletics tracks. You are supplied with the design parameter  length to
width ratio. You are also told that the sliced circles will be such that they
are part of the same circle. You have to find the length and width of the
rectangle.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input</span></b><br>
There will be at most 1000 test cases. Each test case will be given in one
line. It will contain ratio of the length and width of the rectangle in the
format  a : b. Here, a and b will be integers and both will be between 1 and
1000 (inclusive).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output a line in the following format 
Case n: L W where n is the case no (starting from 1) and L and W are length
and width of the rectangle (in meters) respectively. You can output as many
digits as you want after the decimal point. Output will be verified by a
validator for 1E-5 precision.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-style:normal'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'><span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                           </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <td width=297 valign=top style='width:222.55pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3 : 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>5 : 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=373 valign=top style='width:279.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 117.1858168913 78.1238779275<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: 107.2909560477 85.8327648381<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Sabbir Yousuf Sanny, Special Thanks: Manzurur
Rahman Khan <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Judgment
  Day<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;tab-stops:161.25pt'><span
style='font-size:8.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1032" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:4.5pt;width:249.6pt;height:312.6pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image005.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=333 height=417
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image005.jpg"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1032"><![endif]>Nowadays,
Talent Shows have become really popular. There are a number of TV and News
media in your country, and each and every one of them has it's own Who is the
Biggest Talent show. These shows require a set of judges, who evaluate the
performance of all the participants. All the participants are called to
participate in a particular order to perform in front of the judges. Then the
judges simultaneously evaluates them. Although, they are asked to grade them by
a score between 0 and 100, some of the judges feel that, there are
participants, who deserves more, so, they can actually give them any score they
think right. The final score of a participant is the sum of all the scores
given by the judges.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Any people, not involved with any
of these activities, may think that this is a really easy job both for the
judges and the participants. Because, all the participants has to do is to do
something they really like. On the other hand, judges have the easier job, they
just have to relax and enjoy the performance pulled by the competitors. Since,
everyone do this thing in their leisure time, they think that being a judge is
possibly the best possible work anyone can find.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But actually, it is as exhausting
as any other work. The first few hours may be enjoyable, but soon it becomes
tedious and boring. Now, as there are so many talent shows, and every one of
them use the same persons as their judge,<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Since, one has to judge at different shows, not all of them can watch
all the performances. They decided to appear each of the show for only one
session. It means, that, a judge may appear in one show, at some specified
time, and stay a certain period there, and leave. After he leaves, he will
never return to the show.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Goju is working in one of the
Talent shows and he is very optimistic about his show. At the end of the day,
one of the crews, who was inside with the judges, informed him that, all the
judges were really tired, so, they just gave the same score to all the
participants. Your inside man don't know how much each participants scored. But
he was able to guess that, and he assures you that, the participant didn't
score less than what he guessed. He has also given you a crucial information,
how much generous the judges are. He has also given a generosity score to each
of the judges, which is an integer between <b>1</b> and <b>1000000</b>. The
lower the generosity score, the higher he is supposed to grade. But you should
remember that, the generosity score is just an assumption. It is possible that,
a judge with lower generosity score, may grade lower than someone, whose
generosity score is higher.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, Goju wants to know how much
point each judge given to the participants. But, since he is very busy, he
don't have time to solve this on his own. He asked you to solve it.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input contains <b><i>T</i></b>(<span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>&#8804;200)</span>,
the number of test cases. Each test case starts with two integers <b><i>J C</i></b>(1<span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>&#8804;J,C,100)</span>,
the number of judges and the number of competitors. Next line contains <b><i>C</i></b>
integers <b><i>s<sub>i</sub>(i = 1, 2, 
, C)</i></b> where <b><i>s<sub>i</sub></i></b>
(1 <b><i><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
Verdana'>&#8804; </span></i></b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:Verdana;
mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>s<sub>i</sub><b><i> &#8804; </i></b></span>1000000)
is the score of the <b><i>i</i></b>-th participant, the crew guessed. All the
participants are numbered from 1 to <b><i>C</i></b>. This is followed by <b><i>J</i></b>
lines, where <b><i>j</i></b>-th of this contain three integers, <b><i>p<sub>j</sub>,
q<sub>j</sub></i></b> and <b><i>g<sub>j</sub></i></b>, (1 <b><i><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>&#8804; </span></i></b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>g<sub>j</sub><b><i>
&#8804;</i></b>1000000<b><i>, </i></b>1<b><i>&#8804;</i></b><i>p<sub>j</sub><b>&#8804;</b><sub>
</sub>q<sub>j</sub><b>&#8804; C</b></i>)</span>which means that, <b><i>j</i></b>-th
judge only grades participants numbered between <b><i>p<sub>j</sub></i></b> and
<b><i>q<sub>j</sub></i></b> (inclusive), and his generosity is <b><i>g<sub>j</sub></i></b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>There is a blank line before each test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output the
case number, followed by <b><i>J</i></b> integers <b><i>m<sub>j</sub></i></b>, how
much points, each judge has given. All the scores are nonnegative integers and
must fit inside a 32 bit signed integer. Since, there can be many solutions, he
wants you to minimize <span style='font-family:Verdana;mso-fareast-font-family:
Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>&#8721;</span> <b><i>m<sub>j</sub></i></b>
* <b><i>g<sub>j</sub></i></b>. If there are still more than one solution answer
any one of them. You can assume that there will always be at least one
solution.</p>

<h1><![if !supportLists]><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'><span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span></b><![endif]><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:

  "Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>C<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Divide
  the Land <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Mr. Rahim Mia has some lands of trapezium
shape. He wants to divide each of the lands between his two sons so that
everyone gets equal area in every land. But as Mr. Rahim is not so good at
mathematics, he is confused how to divide the lands equally. He decided to
divide the land with a line parallel to the parallel lines of the trapezium.
Yet he is getting problem to determine the points to draw the line. So he came
to you. Please write a program for him that finds the distance of the points
along the non-parallel lines of the trapezium to from the longer parallel line
that will divide the land into two equal parts in terms of area. For example,
consider the following figure, you have to find the lengths AE and BF so that
ABFE and EFCD are equal in area and EF||AB given AB, BC, CD, DA.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:240pt;
 height:116.25pt' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/c_files/image007.jpg"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=320 height=155
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/c_files/image007.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;
tab-stops:.5in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of Input will be a
number mentioning the number of lands Mr. Rahim has (at most 500). Each of the
following numbers is description of Rahims land.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each description will consist of 4 positive
integers mentioning AB, CD, AD and BC (less than 10000). You may assume that
AB||CD and AB &gt; CD. You may also assume that all of Rahims lands are
trapezium shaped and has a positive area.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each of the lands you should
output the number of the land and then the lengths AE and BF as two real
numbers. Up to 1e-6 error in your output will be acceptable. </p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><![if !supportLists]><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'><span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span></b><![endif]><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>
