<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Home!
  Sweet Home!<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=665
 style='width:498.6pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:14.25pt'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.3pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:14.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'>Own home
  is the sweetest place if it is really secured. People build wall around home
  to make their home more secured. Some pillars are required to make more
  strong wall. There is a shop named Home! Sweet Home!, which sells pillar
  specially made for building walls. This is really a busy shop. Everyday lot
  of contractors come, who are responsible for building walls, having a list of
  homes in their hands. Their list usually contains information of homes
  specially height of the home and number of pillars required to build that
  home. </p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.3pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:14.25pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1033" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
   margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:243.6pt;height:159.75pt;z-index:2;
   mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
   mso-position-horizontal:center;mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;
   mso-position-vertical-relative:text' filled="t">
   <v:fill color2="black"/>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/d_files/image010.jpg"  o:title=" />
   <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=325 height=213
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/d_files/image010.jpg"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1033"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>They find pillars are arranged in
a row in that shop. Every pillars in row are tagged with heights. Every
contractors want to buy some pillars such that they can make walls for all those
homes in their list. But unfortunately the shop has some limitation of pillars.
So the owner of that shop decides to hire you to write a program for them,
which can calculate the number of maximum possible home, for which the
contractor can build wall using the pillars in that shop.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Note that, a pillar having less height than a home cannot be
used to build wall in that home for security purpose.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;
tab-stops:.5in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of input will contain
a number T(1&lt;=T&lt;=200), which indicates the number of test cases. Each
test case starts with a line having two integers NP and NH(1&lt;=NP&lt;=100000,
1&lt;=NH&lt;=100000), number of pillars in Home! Sweet Home! and number of
homes in contractor's list. The next line will contain three integers A, B and
C (1 &lt;= A, B, C &lt;= 10000). You can calculate height of the pillars of the
shop by this way -</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>PH<sub>1 </sub>=
C % 10000 + 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>PH<sub>2</sub> =
(A * PH<sub>1</sub> + C) % 10000 + 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>PH<sub>i</sub> =
(A * PH<sub>i-1 </sub>+ B * PH<sub>i-2</sub> + C) % 10000 + 1, where
3&lt;=i&lt;=NP.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here PH<sub>i</sub> represents
the height of i<sup>th</sup> pillar in the row of the shop.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The next line will contain six
integers E, F, G, H, I and J. (1 &lt;= E, F, G, H, I, J &lt;= 10000). You can
generate the height of the homes and number of pillars required for
corresponding homes in the list by this way </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>HH<sub>1</sub> =
G % 10000 + 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>PR<sub>1</sub> =
J % 100000 + 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>HH<sub>i</sub> =
(E * HH<sub>i-1</sub> + F * PR<sub>i-1</sub> + G) % 10000 + 1, where
2&lt;=i&lt;=NH<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:13.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>PR<sub>i</sub> =
(H * PR<sub>i-1</sub> + I * HH<sub>i-1</sub> + J) % 100000 + 1, where
2&lt;=i&lt;=NH<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Here HH<sub>i</sub> represents height of i<sup>th</sup> home
and PR<sub>i</sub> represents number of pillars required to build wall for i<sup>th</sup>
home.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output a single line of the form Case
X: N, where X denotes the case number and N denotes the maximum number home
for which it is possible to make a wall.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><![if !supportLists]><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'><span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span></b><![endif]><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>10 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2 10 19<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1 2 1 1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=310 valign=top style='width:232.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

h6
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:0in;
	margin-left:.8in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	text-indent:-.8in;
	line-height:41.0pt;
	mso-line-height-rule:exactly;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-outline-level:6;
	mso-list:l0 level6 lfo2;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	tab-stops:list .8in;
	font-size:54.5pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:Algerian;
	position:relative;

	{mso-footnote-separator:url("e_files/header.html") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("e_files/header.html") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("e_files/header.html") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("e_files/header.html") ecs;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.25pt 841.85pt;
	margin:.8in .6in 56.9pt .6in;
	mso-header-margin:.9in;
	mso-footer-margin:.6in;
	mso-page-numbers:1;
	mso-even-header:url("e_files/header.html") eh1;
	mso-header:url("e_files/header.html") h1;
	mso-even-footer:url("e_files/header.html") ef1;
	mso-footer:url("e_files/header.html") f1;
	mso-first-header:url("e_files/header.html") fh1;
	mso-first-footer:url("e_files/header.html") ff1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}

	{page:Section1;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}

	mso-list-template-ids:3;
	mso-list-name:WW8Num10;}
@list l2:level1
	{mso-level-text:"%1\)";
	mso-level-tab-stop:0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
  AR-SA;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Mirror
  Clock<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Little Onuvob has learnt to read
wall clock.Very often he loudly announces the time. He has a big clock in his
room. There is also a mirror in the opposite side of the clock. Few days ago
his mother noticed that sometimes Onuvob is announcing wrong time. She became
worried and after some investigation she found, Onuvob has no problem in
reading time from the clock, the thing is sometimes he reads from the clock in
the mirror. So she told him</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1034" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:-.15pt;width:141.5pt;height:112.75pt;
 z-index:-1;mso-wrap-distance-left:9.05pt;mso-wrap-distance-right:9.05pt;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' wrapcoords="-95 0 -95 21475 21600 21475 21600 0 -95 0"
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image012.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=189 height=150
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image012.jpg"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1034"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Onuvob, you shouldnt read time
from the clock in the mirror.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But why ma? curious Onuvob
asked. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Because it gives wrong time
mother replied.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now Onuvob looked at the two
clocks and realized his mother was telling the truth. Two clocks were not
matching. He thought for some time and shouted, But ma, we can calculate the
real time from the clock in the mirror, cant we?</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Can we? Now you have to answer. </p>

<h3 style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
0in;text-indent:0in;mso-pagination:none;page-break-after:avoid;mso-list:none;
tab-stops:.5in'><span lang=SV style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input
contains an integer T (T &lt; 1000), number of test cases. Each of the
following T lines will contain the time Onuvob reads from the clock in the
mirror. The time will be in the following format: HH:MM</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Hours and minutes both are
integer and the time is always valid.</p>

<h2 align=left style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;mso-pagination:none;mso-list:
none;tab-stops:.5in 143.25pt'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of Input you have
to produce one line of output which will contain the real time, in the same format,
namely:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>HH:MM </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>See sample input and output for
more clarification.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>12:00<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <pre><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>10:09<o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=310 valign=top style='width:232.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>12:00<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>01:</span>
  <span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>51<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image012.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1035"><![endif]><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata croptop="-65520f" cropbottom="65520f"/>
</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

 /* Page Definitions */
 @page
	{mso-footnote-separator:url("f_files/header.html") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("f_files/header.html") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("f_files/header.html") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("f_files/header.html") ecs;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.25pt 841.85pt;
	margin:.8in .6in 56.9pt .6in;
	mso-header-margin:.9in;
	mso-footer-margin:.6in;
	mso-page-numbers:1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
@page Section2
	{size:595.25pt 841.85pt;
	margin:.5in .7in .6in .7in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-even-header:url("f_files/header.html") eh2;
	mso-header:url("f_files/header.html") h2;
	mso-even-footer:url("f_files/header.html") ef2;
	mso-footer:url("f_files/header.html") f2;
	mso-first-header:url("f_files/header.html") fh2;
	mso-first-footer:url("f_files/header.html") ff2;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section2
	{page:Section2;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
 /* List Definitions */
 @list l0
	{mso-list-id:1;
	mso-list-template-ids:1;}
@list l0:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.3in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.3in;
	text-indent:-.3in;}
@list l0:level2
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.4in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.4in;
	text-indent:-.4in;}
@list l0:level3
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.5in;
	text-indent:-.5in;}
@list l0:level4
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.6in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.6in;
	text-indent:-.6in;}
@list l0:level5
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.7in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.7in;
	text-indent:-.7in;}
@list l0:level6
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.8in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.8in;
	text-indent:-.8in;}
@list l0:level7
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.9in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:.9in;
	text-indent:-.9in;}
@list l0:level8
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:1.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:1.0in;
	text-indent:-1.0in;}
@list l0:level9
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:1.1in;

	margin-left:1.1in;
	text-indent:-1.1in;}

	{mso-list-id:2;
	mso-list-type:simple;
	mso-list-template-ids:2;
	mso-list-name:WW8Num8;}

	{mso-level-text:"%1\)";
	mso-level-tab-stop:0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	mso-list-type:simple;
	mso-list-template-ids:3;
	mso-list-name:WW8Num10;}

-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Krypton
  Number System<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>All of you must have heard the
name of the planet <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Krypton</b>. If you
cant remember the planet, dont worry. Planet Krypton is the origin of
Superman, that means the mother planet where Superman was born. Superman was
sent to earth by his parents when the planet was about to explode. Legends say
that only few people of the planet survived from that explosion.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The inhabitants of the planet is
called Kryptonians. Kryptonians, though otherwise completely human, were
superior both intellectually and physically to natives of Earth. One of the
most common differences is their number system. The number system is denoted
below</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The base of the number system is unknown, but
legends say that the base lies between 2 and 6.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Kryptinians dont use a number where two
adjacent digits are same. They simply ignore these numbers. So, 112 is not a valid
number in Krypton.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>3)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Numbers should not contain leading zeroes. So,
012 is not a valid number.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>4)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>For each number, there is a score. The score can
be found by summing up the squares of differences of adjacent numbers. For
example 1241 has the score of<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>(1-2)<sup>2</sup>
+ (2-4)<sup>2</sup> + (4-1)<sup>2</sup> = 1 + 4 + 9 = 14.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>5)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>All the numbers they use are integers.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now you are planning to research
on their number system. So, you assume a base and a score. You have to find,
how many numbers can make the score in that base.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input will
contain an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T (&lt;= 200)</b>,
denoting the number of cases. Then<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b> cases will follow.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each case contains two integers
denoting <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>base (2 &lt;= base &lt;= 6)</b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>score (1 &lt;= score &lt;= 10<sup>9</sup>)</b>.
Both the integers will be given in decimal base.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

<span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
AR-SA;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always;
mso-break-type:section-break'>
</span>

<div class=Section2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;page-break-before:always'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each case
print the case number and the result modulo <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>2<sup>32</sup></b>. Check the samples for details. Both the case number
and result should be reported in decimal base</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-5.4pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>6 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>5 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=310 valign=top style='width:232.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 9<br>
  Case 2: 80<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=25 valign=top style='width:18.95pt;border:none;border-left:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin;mso-field-lock:yes'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>\* MERGEFORMAT <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s1026" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt;

 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=659 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image009.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"

 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><![endif]--><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape

</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:Wingdings;
	panose-1:5 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0;
	mso-font-charset:2;
	mso-generic-font-family:auto;
	mso-font-pitch:variable;
	mso-font-signature:0 268435456 0 0 -2147483648 0;}
@font-face
	{font-family:"MS Mincho";
	panose-1:2 2 6 9 4 2 5 8 3 4;
	mso-font-alt:"\FF2D\FF33 \660E\671D";
	mso-font-charset:128;
	mso-generic-font-family:modern;
	mso-font-pitch:fixed;
	mso-font-signature:-536870145 1791491579 18 0 131231 0;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Power
  Faster<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><br>
<!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75"
 o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:204pt;
 height:242.25pt' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image014.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=272 height=323
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image014.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-pagination:none'>This is Power
Faster. In future, this is going the primary study material for the children of
primary schools in <st1:country-region w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Bangladesh</st1:place></st1:country-region>.
A durable, waterproof, power efficient and light weight electronic device. Laptops
are out of consideration in the first place. We are living in a land of
hurricanes, heavy rain falls and floods, after all. And besides, this device is
supposed to be used by a 5 to 10 year old kid. Carrying it to school everyday
and again carrying it back home is only possible when the device is truly
portable according to a child's standards.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-pagination:none'><br>
The flat rectangular part to the front is the display unit. And LDC screen
consisting of pixel arranged in a regular grid of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>R</i></b> rows and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>C</i></b>
collumns along with a display adaptar comprises the display unit. The LDC
screen has some special properties making it power efficient in an unusual way.
It consumes least power when exactly 50% of its pixels are turned ON and the
rest are OFF. For any other number of ON and OFF pixels, the power consumption
increases linearly upto the point of maximum consumption which occurs when
either all pixels are turned ON or all are turend OFF.<br>
<br>
The display adapter gets a bitmap image with dimensions <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>r </i><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>x </span><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>c</i></b>, let us call
it the input image, which has to be shown on the screen. To minimize the power
consumption, display adapter scales the image in horizontal and vertical
directions by integer scaling factors such that the dimensions of the scaled
input image do not exceed that of the display screen. The scaling factors in
horizontal and vertical direction are independent.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The scaling process is analogous to enlarging a photograph.
When scaled by a horizontal and vertical scaling factor of <b><i>hs</i></b> and
<b><i>vs</i></b> respectively, the result is an image of <b><i>r*vs</i></b>
rows and <b><i>c*hs</i></b> columns. Each pixel in the input images corresponds
to a rectangle of <b><i>vs</i></b> rows and <b><i>hs</i></b> columns in the
resulting image. Note that, however tempting it might seem, the display adapter
does not perform any kind of rotation.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are asked to write a program
performing the scaling for the display adapter.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;
tab-stops:.5in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input will consist of multiple test case. Each test case
starts with a line containing 4 positive integers <b><i>R C r c</i></b>
seperated by whitespace. Next <b><i>r</i></b> lines, each having <b><i>c</i></b>
characters on it, comprises the input image. The input image is drawn using <b>'.'</b>
(dot) and <b>'#'</b> (hash) characters and there will be no other character in
the input image. You can also assume that, <b><i>R &gt;= C, r&gt;=c</i></b> and
all numbers are positive integers smaller than <b>30000</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>There will be <b>1005</b> such test cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>Print one line of output for each test case. The output of
each case starts with the case number written as <b><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>Case n: </span> </b>(excluding the quote marks) as shown in the
sample output followed by two integers. The first integer will be the scaling
factor in horizontal direction, second integer should be the scaling factor in
vertical direction. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>If more than one possible way to achieve minimum power
consumption exists, output the one with largest horizontal scaling factor. If
there are still multiple solutions, output the one with smallest vertical
scaling factor. All numbers should be positive integers.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>50 25 8 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>####<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#..#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#..#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#..#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#..#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#..#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#..#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>####<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=310 valign=top style='width:232.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:13.6pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 6 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin;mso-field-lock:yes'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>\* MERGEFORMAT <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s1026" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:char;mso-position-vertical-relative:line;

 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>

 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=659 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image014.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt'>

</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span

	{mso-style-name:apple-converted-space;}
 /* Page Definitions */

	mso-footer:url("h_files/header.html") f1;
	mso-first-header:url("h_files/header.html") fh1;
	mso-first-footer:url("h_files/header.html") ff1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
 /* List Definitions */

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;

	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Stick
  Makes Gold<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In a village far far away, there
lived a cowboy named 'Rakhal Balok'. He used to spend most of his time with his
cows. Though he was poor, he was happy with his life, cause his life was simple
and trouble-less. Each day, after leaving the cows in the field, he used to
wander around. The days were going fine except one day he found a cave in a
jungle not too far away from the field. As he was curious and the cave looked
so interesting, he had no option but to go inside it.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>After entering the cave, he found
that the cave was way too long with no branches. And after reaching the end of
the cave he found another jungle. Alas! It's nothing but a big disappointment.
But wait! There is something fishy. He saw that the cave was long, he passed
the cave but the time spent was really low. He saw the sun and he became sure
about that. So, there was something in the cave that he missed. So, he began to
walk into the cave again. In the last time he wanted to check for branches, but
this time he wanted to see the details of the cave.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Soon, he found some sticks lying
in the ground. And he could see that the number of sticks was huge, but one
thing was common - they were placed in a straight line. That means he could
touch one end of a stick, not the other end. To touch the other end he had to
walk to reach the other end. Not only this, he found that the sticks were
magical. When he touched a stick he got some gold coins. After collecting some
gold coins, he found the behavior of the sticks. Here we list his discoveries
while he was returning back.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&quot;The length of the sticks
are integers and each unit part of a stick is numbered as 1, 2, 3 
 Suppose
starting and ending point of a stick is 3 and 5 respectively. Then the part (3
4) is denoted as the first part and (4 5) is numbered as the second part. There
are three types of sticks</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l2 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>1)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Ekka: If the length of the stick is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> and anyone touches the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b>th part of the stick, it will produce <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b> gold coins. For example, if a stick
is of length 5, then there are 5 parts of the stick. If anyone touches the
first part, he will get 1 gold coin, if anyone touches the 4<sup>th</sup> part
he will get 4 gold coins.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l2 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>2)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Dokka: If the length of the stick is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> and anyone touches the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b>th part of the stick, it will produce <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i<sup>2</sup></b> gold coins. For example,
if a stick is of length 5 and anyone touches the 2<sup>nd</sup> part, he will
get 4 gold coins, if anyone touches the 4<sup>th</sup> part he will get 16 gold
coins.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l2 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>3)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Trikka: If the length of the stick is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> and anyone touches the <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b>th part of the stick, it will produce <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i<sup>3</sup></b> gold coins. For example,
if a stick is of length 5 and anyone touches the 2<sup>nd</sup> part, he will
get 8 gold coins, if anyone touches the 4<sup>th</sup> part he will get 64 gold
coins.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The length of the cave is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>. What will be the number of coins if
I reach the end of the cave? Since the time is not an issue here, I will touch
every part of every stick.&quot;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now you are given the information
about the sticks and the cave. You have to find the total number of gold coins
found by our cowboy. You can assume that the cowboy started his journey
(returning back) from the position 0 and he will get out if he reaches <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>. And all the other information will
be given based on his position. All the sticks will be strictly inside the
cave.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial Narrow";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input file
will contain <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T (&lt;= 20)</b>, denoting
the number of test cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of each case will
contain two integers, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N ( 1 &lt;= N
&lt;= 1000000 )</b> denoting the length of the cave and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>M ( 1 &lt;= M &lt;= 100000 )</b> denoting the number of sticks. Each of
the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> lines will contain three
integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>a<sub>i</sub> b<sub>i</sub></b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(
1 &lt;= t &lt;= 3, 0 &lt;= a<sub>i</sub> &lt; b<sub>i</sub> &lt; N )</b>, where
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t</b> is the type, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>a<sub>i</sub></b> is the start point and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>b<sub>i</sub></b> is the end point of the stick. The next line will
contain an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Q ( &lt;= 100000 )</b>
denoting the number of queries. The next line contains Q sorted integers
separated by spaces, denoting the position of our cowboy.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case of input print the
case number in a single line. Then There should be Q lines, containing the
number of total gold coins collected by our cowboy in the given position. Check
the samples for more details. The result can be big, so, print the result
modulo 2<sup>64</sup>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Note: Large input output file,
use faster i/o functions, e.g. scanf, printf. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:12.45pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:12.45pt'><pre style='layout-grid-mode:

  "Times New Roman"'>10 3 <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='layout-grid-mode:

  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>

<div class=Section1>

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b

  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b

  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportLists]><span style='mso-list:Ignore'><span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1035" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:1.3pt;width:149.2pt;height:108.7pt;
 z-index:2;mso-wrap-distance-left:9.05pt;mso-wrap-distance-right:9.05pt;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/i_files/image016.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=199 height=145
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/i_files/image016.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1035"><![endif]>A
sequence of numbers is said to be arithmetic if there is a constant difference
between successive elements. For example {1,5,9} is an arithmetic sequence
where the difference between each term is 4 and the sequence contains three
elements. In this problem, given a set of numbers, you are to determine how
many proper subset of this set is an arithmetic sequence. The elements in the
subset must be in the same order as they occur in the superset. That is for the
superset { 1,3,6},<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,3} is a subset but
not {3,1}.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input will be a
positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T&lt;=100</b>,<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </b>where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T</b> denotes the number of test cases. Each case starts with a
positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n&lt;=250. </b>This is
followed by <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n </b>non negative integers
each on a new line.<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></b>The value of these integers will be less
100000001. The <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n </b>integers represent
the elements of the superset.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case of input there will
be one line of output. It will be the number of subsets which form an arithmetic
sequence as described earlier. The numbers maybe very large, therefore you are
to give the answer modulo 10000007. Follow sample output for exact format.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:12.45pt'>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:12.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:1.15in'>
  <td width=105 valign=top style='width:78.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>J<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:1.15in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on"><span
    style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Water</span></st1:PlaceName><span
   style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'> <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Land</st1:PlaceType></span></st1:place><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The year 3110. Most of the lands
have disappeared under water, leaving many small islands. Waterland is a
peaceful country consisting of many such islands. All islands in Waterland are
connected by tunnels. Each tunnel connects exactly two islands. Tunnels are
very expensive to build, so WRTA (<st1:Street w:st="on"><st1:address w:st="on">Waterland
  Road</st1:address></st1:Street> and Tunnel Authorities) tries to keep the
number of tunnels as low as possible. (You may be wondering why not just use
air transport! Air transport can no longer be used due to terrible weather
condition.)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>President of Waterland wants to
spend his upcoming vacation in <st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Yablonoi</st1:PlaceName>
<st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType>, after the long and tedious hours
of work at office (<st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Kurai</st1:PlaceName>
 <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>). The Elite
Security Force (ESF) of Waterland, who is responsible for presidents security,
always takes precautions before his journey. They have selected some of the
safe tunnels from <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Kurai</st1:PlaceName>
 <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place> to Yablonoi
island. Safe tunnels are chosen in such a way that if anyone starts to travel
from Kuriai island to <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Yablonoi</st1:PlaceName>
 <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>, it is not
possible to visit any island twice with any possible route.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>ESF sends a group of teams in all
routes from <st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Kurai</st1:PlaceName> <st1:PlaceType
w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType> to <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Yablonoi</st1:PlaceName>
 <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>. Each group of
teams drops one team at each island (except Kuroi  the presidents office) on
their route and moves on. At the end, for each route, only one team from each
group will reach in <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Yablonoi</st1:PlaceName>
 <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>. Therefore, one
island may contain multiple teams from different groups. Now the Chief of ESF
asks you to calculate the total number of teams required for the whole process
and the number of teams reached at destination (<st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName
 w:st="on">Yablonoi</st1:PlaceName> <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;
tab-stops:.5in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input
represents the number of test cases <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N (N&#8804;40)</i></b>. Each test case
starts with a line containing 2 numbers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L</i></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>T</i></b>, where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L</i></b>
represents the number of island <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>(2 &#8804; L &#8804; 5000)</i></b> in that
country and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>T</i></b> (0<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>&#8804;T&#8804;5*L)</i></b> represents the number of safe tunnels.
After that, there will be <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>T</i></b> lines with two numbers: <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>x</i></b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>y</i></b>
(1<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>&#8804;
x,y &#8804; L) </i></b>representing the tunnel between <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>island x</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>island y</i>.
All of these tunnels are one way (from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>x</i></b> to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>y</i></b>) on that day (for the
sake of presidents safety). There will be at most one tunnel between any two
islands. Consider the island 1 as Kurai island and island L as Yablonoi
island. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print the
case number first followed by two numbers, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>S</i>
and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D</i> where <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>S</i> represents the number of teams that is required by ESF for the
whole process and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>D</i> represents the
number of teams that reached in the meeting place after the whole operation.
Print both numbers (S and D) in modulo 1,00,000.</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-list:none;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:34.45pt'>
  <td width=314 valign=top style='width:235.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
