	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Income
Tax Hazard (II) </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:18.45pt;margin-top:4.15pt;width:196.2pt;
 height:138.85pt;z-index:1'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=262 height=185
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/b_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]>The
word tax makes us unhappy and if it is income tax it saddens us even more (have
you ever wondered why many rich people leave their own country and stay in <st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Switzerland</st1:country-region></st1:place>).
The strangest thing is that in many countries and states one has to pay income
tax as well as sales tax. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now you are in a strange new
country, whose income tax structure is almost unknown to you. The things that
you know about the salary/tax structure of this country are given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<ol style='margin-top:0in' start=1 type=1>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;
     tab-stops:list .5in'>Salary is always an integer but income tax may or may
     not be integer. Your salary is denoted with <b>M</b>.</li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;
     tab-stops:list .5in'>There are two slabs for income tax denoted by two
     integers <b>S<sub>1</sub></b> and <b>S<sub>2</sub></b>. You have to pay
     10% income tax for salary part above <b>S<sub>1</sub></b> and below (<b>S<a
     name="OLE_LINK2"></a><a name="OLE_LINK1"><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><sub>2</sub></span></a>)</b>.</li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;
     tab-stops:list .5in'>You don&#8217;t have to pay any income tax for the
     salary below <b>S<sub>1</sub></b>.</li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;
     tab-stops:list .5in'>For salary portion above <b>S<sub>2</sub></b> you
     will have to pay 20% income tax. So if <b>S<sub>1</sub>=</b>50000<b> </b>and<b>
     S<sub>2</sub>=</b>100000 and your salary is 120000, then your total income
     tax will be 50000*0.10+20000*0.20=9000.</li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;
     tab-stops:list .5in'>The problem is<span class=GramE>,</span> you
     don&#8217;t know the value of <b>S<sub>1</sub></b> and <b>S<sub>2</sub></b>.
     Only thing you know is that the value of <b>S<sub>1</sub></b> and <b>S<sub>2</sub></b>
     is within two given integer values <b>min</b> and <b>max</b> (inclusive)
     and <b>S<sub>1</sub>&lt;=S<sub>2</sub></b>.</li>
</ol>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now given the values of <b>min</b>,
<b>max</b> and <b>M</b> you have two find the expected amount of income tax
that you need to pay. You should assume that all distinct combinations of S1
and S2 satisfying the above conditions are equally likely.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains around <b>10000</b>
line of input. Each line contains three integers <b>M (0 &lt; M &#8804; 400000)</b>,
<b>min</b> and <b>max (50000 &#8804; min &#8804; max &#8804; 200000)</b>. Their
meaning is given in the problem statement above. Input will be terminated with
three zeroes in a single line.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
14.0pt'>Output </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the serial of output
followed by a floating-point number which denotes the expected amount of
income. This floating-point number should be rounded to two digits after
decimal point. </p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10000 50000
  50002<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>70000 50000
  80000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 <span
  class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 0.00<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 1333.36<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem Setter: Shahriar <span class=SpellE>Manzoor</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span
style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>How Many Teams?</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input: </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_s1047" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:228pt;
 margin-top:3pt;width:222pt;height:174.75pt;z-index:1;visibility:visible'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/c_files/image010.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=296 height=233
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/c_files/image010.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="Picture_x0020_1"><![endif]><st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:PlaceType w:st="on">University</st1:PlaceType> of <st1:PlaceName
 w:st="on">Fixed Problems</st1:PlaceName></st1:place> (UFP) was planning to host
a national level computer programming competition but just before the event
they have realized that they dont have a budget that is big enough for a
national programming contest!</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>On the eve of the contest, you get
a phone call from them and hear the inevitable  The Contest is Called Off.
However, they said they will be hosting a General Knowledge competition
instead. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The restriction on the number of
teams goes like this:</p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Your
university can send a total of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>
contestants with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> members in each
team. That means there are a total of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N/K</b>
teams.<o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A notice was sent to all
departments of your university asking them to select their best students for
participating in this competition. Due to the limited number of seats, a
department can send at most 3 members.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You managed to gather <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> students from various departments.
Within this limited time, its not going to be viable to come up with the best
balanced teams. So you tell all these students to line up randomly and assign
first <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> students in one team, the
next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> students in another team and
so on. But, one rule that you are going to follow is that two person from the
same department cannot be in the same team. This will enable the teams to be
more balanced.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Of the entire <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N! (N Factorial)</b> permutations of lining
up, can you find out how many of those are valid? A permutation is valid if you
can assign the teams according to the rules mentioned above.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Example: Consider a case where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> = 4 and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>K</b> = 2.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>PM-<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>MATH</b>, LT-<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>CSE</b>, DK-<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>MATH</b>, MMR-<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>EEE</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Suppose you have 4 students (PM,
LT, DK and MMR) and their departments are (MATH, CSE, MATH and EEE)
respectively. You have to form 2 teams with 2 members in each team.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Some valid permutations are: (PM
LT DK MMR) (LT PM DK MMR) (MMR PM LT DK<span class=GramE>)</span><br>
And some invalid permutations are: (PM DK MMR LT) (LT MMR DK PM).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line is an integer <span
class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>(</span>T&lt;500) that
indicates the number of test cases. Each case starts with 2 integers <span
class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>(</span>1 &lt;= <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> &lt;= 100) and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>K</b>(1 &lt;= <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> &lt;= 10).
It is guaranteed that <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> % <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> = 0. The next line will contain <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> space separated strings of the format
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S1-D1 S2-D2 S3-D3 ... SN-DN</b>. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S<sub>i</sub></b> gives you the names of
each student and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D<sub>i</sub></b> gives
you the corresponding department of that student. All the students names will be
distinct. The department and student names will be alphanumeric and the length
of each will be at most 20.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case, output the case
number followed by the total number of valid permutations. Since the result
could be very big, output the result modulo <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>1234</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-tab-count:2'>          </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                           </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#E6E6E6;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=439 valign=top style='width:329.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>sohelH</span></span><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>-CSE <span class=SpellE>samee</span>-CSE<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Blind-ECS <span class=SpellE>sidky</span>-CSE <span
  class=SpellE>muntasir</span>-CSC <span class=SpellE>ShadowCoder</span>-EEE<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>ABC-D1 DEF-D1 ghi-D2
  jkl-D3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=168 valign=top style='width:1.75in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:11.0pt'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 0<br>
  Case 2: 24<br>
  Case 3: 16<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:11.0pt'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>: <span class=SpellE>Sohel</span> Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special
Thanks to: <span class=SpellE>Arifuzzaman</span> <span class=SpellE>Arif</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span
style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Non-Decreasing Prime Sequence</span></b><b><span style='font-size:24.0pt;
font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input: </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A prime number is a natural
number which has exactly two distinct natural number divisors. First few prime
numbers are: 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, <span class=GramE>
<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>and</span> so on.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A non decreasing prime sequence
(NDPS) is a sequence of prime numbers where <span class=SpellE>i<sup>th</sup></span>
element is not less than i-1<sup>th</sup> element for all <span class=SpellE>i</span>&gt;1.
The weight of a NDPS is the product of all numbers of the sequence. Here are
some examples of <span class=SpellE>NDPSs</span> with their corresponding
weights.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:106.05pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:
 fixed;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:13.8pt'>
  <td width=99 valign=top style='width:73.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b>NDPS<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=132 valign=top style='width:99.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b>Weight<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;height:13.8pt'>
  <td width=99 valign=top style='width:73.9pt;border-top:none;border-left:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'>2</p>
  </td>
  <td width=132 valign=top style='width:99.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'>2</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;height:13.8pt'>
  <td width=99 valign=top style='width:73.9pt;border-top:none;border-left:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'>2 5 13</p>
  </td>
  <td width=132 valign=top style='width:99.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'>130 (2 X 5 X 13)</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:13.8pt'>
  <td width=99 valign=top style='width:73.9pt;border-top:none;border-left:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'>2 3 97</p>
  </td>
  <td width=132 valign=top style='width:99.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'>582 (2 X 3 X 97)</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>An NDPS <span class=GramE><b>a</b>
is</span> smaller than another NDPS <b>b</b>, if number of elements in <b>a</b>
is smaller than the number of elements in <b>b</b>. If <span class=GramE><b>a</b>
and</span> <b>b</b> has same number of elements then lexicographically smaller
sequence is the smaller NDPS. For the list given above, {2} is the smallest
sequence because it has only one elements. {2 5 13} and {2 3 97} both have 3
elements, so {2 3 97} is second smallest because it is lexicographically
smaller than {2 5 13}.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For a given range (<b>A</b>, <b>B</b>),
where A&lt;=B, you have to find the <span class=SpellE><b>K<sup>th</sup></b></span>
smallest NDPS between all the <span class=SpellE>NDPSs</span> having weights in
between <b>A</b> and <span class=GramE><b>B</b>(</span>inclusive).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will start with an integer <b>T
(T&lt;=5000)</b>, the number of test cases. Each of the next <b>T</b> line will
contain three integers <b>A</b>, <b>B</b> and <b>K (2&lt;=A&lt;=B&lt;=1000000)</b>.
<b>K</b> is a positive integer and you can safely assume that at least <b>K</b>
<span class=SpellE>NDPSs</span> exists in the given range.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case, you have to output
one line, case number followed by the <span class=SpellE><b>K<sup>th</sup></b></span>
smallest NDPS between all the <span class=SpellE>NDPSs</span> having weights
between <b>A</b> and <span class=GramE><b>B</b>(</span>inclusive). See sample
output for exact format.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2 10 1 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2 10 5 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2 10 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 2 <span class=SpellE>2</span> <span class=SpellE>2</span></span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin;mso-field-lock:yes'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>\* MERGEFORMAT <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s1026" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:char;mso-position-vertical-relative:line;
 v-text-anchor:middle' fillcolor="#aca899" stroked="f">
 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=659 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/d_files/image001.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><![endif]--><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata croptop="-65520f" cropbottom="65520f"/>
</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: <span class=SpellE>Arifuzzaman</span>
<span class=SpellE>Arif</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: <span class=SpellE>Manzurur</span> <span
class=SpellE>Rahman</span> Khan <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Physics Experiment</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Experiments are a very
significant part of various branches of Physics such as light, sound or heat.
Now in a world famous underground physics laboratory, a heat experiment is being
carried on. They have gas particles filled in an otherwise empty straight-lined
glass rod. All the particles are on the same horizontal plane &amp; able to
travel only left or right. To be more specific, a particle can move 1 unit
distance per second on either direction or may not move at all. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, for the experiment, one side
of the glass rod is heated by a burner, let's assume this will always be the
left side. The heat is immediately transferred to the left most particle and at
the same time, the particles start to move. Remember that, after this time any
particle can move 1 unit distance to right or left every second or lay unmoved
at a particular second. We shall also assume that, at the start of the
experiment all particles were unheated &amp; not moving. <span class=GramE>An
important characteristics</span> of this gas particles are, multiple of them
can reside in the same place. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Heat transfer takes place by
radiation between two particles. If an unheated particle, at some point comes
at a distance of less than or equal to <b>D</b> units of a heated particle, it
becomes heated. There is no heat loss inside the experimental environment, so a
particle once heated, will be heated forever. Given the initial position of all
the particles, you are to determine the minimum amount of seconds required to
have all the particles heated. </p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;mso-pagination:
none;page-break-after:auto;mso-list:l0 level5 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;
tab-stops:0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h5>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in;mso-pagination:
none;page-break-after:auto;mso-list:l0 level5 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;
tab-stops:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of every test case
contains an integer <b>N (1&lt;=N&lt;=10000)</b>, the number of particles in
the glass rod. Each of the next N lines has a floating point number, the unit
distance of a particle from the left side of the glass rod, given to 3 digits
after the decimal point. The distances will always be non-negative and less
than or equal to 10^7. The last line of the case will be another floating point
value, <b>D (0&lt;=D&lt;=1000)</b>, as described in the statement. <b>D</b>
will have 3 digits after the decimal as well. The last test case will be
followed by a line with a single 0 denoting the end of input. This line should
not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in;mso-pagination:none;mso-list:l0 level4 lfo2;
mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For every test
case, print a line of <span class=SpellE>of</span> the form, Case X: Y, where
X is the serial number of output (starting from 1) and Y is the minimum time in
seconds required to heat all the particles. The result, Y should be printed <span
class=SpellE>upto</span> 3 digits after decimal point. Output having difference
by no more than 0.001 with the official output shall be considered as correct.</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-pagination:none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;
mso-pagination:none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>4.500<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>7.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span

  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2.500<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>6.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3.000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=310 valign=top style='width:232.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 0.250<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 1.500<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><![endif]--><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:494.45pt;height:1.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata croptop="-65520f" cropbottom="65520f"/>
</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Mohammad <span class=SpellE>Mahmudur</span>
<span class=SpellE>Rahman</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: <span class=SpellE>Manzurur</span> <span
class=SpellE>Rahman</span> Khan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sign of a Matrix</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_s1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:324.75pt;
 margin-top:4.85pt;width:170.75pt;height:97.5pt;z-index:1;visibility:visible'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image004.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=228 height=130
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image004.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="Picture_x0020_1"><![endif]><span
class=apple-style-span>You have <span class=GramE>a</span> <b>n</b> x <b>n</b>
zero matrix. In each <b>operation</b>, you can add one (or minus 1) to every
element of a whole row, or add one (or minus 1) to every element of a whole
column. Given the target signs of every element of the matrix, how many
operations are needed?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b></span><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span>There
will be at most 100 test cases. Each test case begins with a line containing a
single integer <b>n</b> (2 &#8804; <b>n </b>&#8804; 100), followed by <b>n</b>
lines of <b>n</b> characters in each line. Each character is one of <b>+</b>, <b>-</b>
or <b>0</b>, corresponding to positive, negative and zero, respectively.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:-webkit-monospace'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></span></span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;
font-family:-webkit-monospace'><br>
</span><span class=apple-style-span><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><br>
For each test case, print the case number and the minimum number of operations
needed. If the target cannot be reached, print -1.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'><span class=apple-style-span><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>4</span></b></span><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>0+00</span><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>-+--</span><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>0+00</span><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>0+00</span><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>2</span><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>+0</span><br>
  <span class=apple-style-span>00<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'>-1</p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=apple-style-span><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1:
  3</span></b></span><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  class=apple-style-span><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: -1</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Sample elaboration:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=apple-style-span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;
font-family:-webkit-monospace'>For the first sample input, target can be
achieved by 3 moves only. By increasing the second column twice and decreasing
the second row once. <span class=GramE>Which will convert the initial matrix to
the following-</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
class=apple-style-span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>0 +<span class=GramE>2<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>0</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span><span class=SpellE>0</span><br>
-1 +1 -1 -1<br>
<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>0 +2<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>0<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=SpellE>0</span><br>
<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>0 +2<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>0<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:10.0pt'><span class=GramE><span
class=apple-style-span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:-webkit-monospace'>Which
is the target matrix.</span></span></span><span class=apple-style-span><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:-webkit-monospace'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Verdana'>Problemsetter: <span
class=SpellE>Rujia</span> Liu<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

class=SpellE>Sohel</span> Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

class=SpellE>Arifuzzaman</span> <span class=SpellE>Arif</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

o\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
w\:* {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
.shape {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
</style>
<![endif]-->

<!--[if gte mso 10]>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Dynamic <span class=GramE>Summation<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></span></span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>Given an array of integers <span
class=GramE>A</span>, you are to process C commands. Each command can be one of
three types:</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=left style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-pagination:none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span lang=EN-GB></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>sum <span class=SpellE>i</span> j</span><span
lang=EN-GB>: output the summation of all integers in the array with indices
between </span><span class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>i</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB> to </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>j</span><span
lang=EN-GB>, inclusive</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=left style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-pagination:none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span lang=EN-GB></span><span class=GramE><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>insert</span></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'> <span class=SpellE>i</span> </span><span
lang=EN-GB>&lt;description of B&gt;: insert a new array B into array A at the
position immediately preceding A[<span class=SpellE>i</span>]. The exact format
of the description of B in the input is provided below.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=left style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-pagination:none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span lang=EN-GB></span><span class=GramE><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>delete</span></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'> <span class=SpellE>i</span> j</span><span
lang=EN-GB>: delete the part of the given array between </span><span
class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>i</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB> and </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>j</span><span
lang=EN-GB>, inclusive.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>All indices in the input will be 0-based.
For each scenario, the starting array is always an empty array of size 0, since
the first command will always be an insert command at position 0 (meaning start
of array).</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>Every insert command will describe an
array of size </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>n</span><span
lang=EN-GB> with </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>r</span><span
lang=EN-GB>+5 space-separated integers all on the same line of input. The first
five of these integers are </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>n</span><span
lang=EN-GB>, </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>r</span><span
lang=EN-GB>, </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>m</span><span
lang=EN-GB>, </span><span class=GramE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>a</span><span
lang=EN-GB> and</span></span><span lang=EN-GB> </span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>c</span><span lang=EN-GB>, in that
order. The rest of the line will contain </span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>r</span><span lang=EN-GB> more
integers: </span><span class=GramE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>b[</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>0]</span><span lang=EN-GB>, </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>b[1]</span><span lang=EN-GB>, 
, </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>b[r-1]</span><span lang=EN-GB>. These
are the first </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>r</span><span
lang=EN-GB> elements of the array B. The rest can be obtained by using the
following scheme:</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=left style='text-align:left'><span class=GramE><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>for</span></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'> each <span class=SpellE>i</span>
from r to n-1, inclusive:<br>
<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>      </span>b[<span class=SpellE>i</span>] = (b[<span
class=SpellE>i</span>-r]*<span class=SpellE>a+c</span>) mod m<br>
<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>      </span>c = ((b[<span class=SpellE>i</span>-r]*<span
class=SpellE>a+c</span>) div m) mod m<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=GramE><span lang=EN-GB>where</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB> </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>a
mod m</span><span lang=EN-GB> is the remainder after dividing </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>a</span><span lang=EN-GB> by </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>m</span><span lang=EN-GB>, while </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>a div m</span><span lang=EN-GB> is
the quotient.</span></p>

<h2 style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
0in;mso-pagination:none;mso-hyphenate:none'>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The input consists of <span class=SpellE>upto</span>
25 scenarios. Each scenario starts with an integer C, followed by C lines of
input, each specifying a command. Each command will be formatted in one of the
tree ways described above. For each </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:
"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Courier 10 Pitch"'>sum</span><span lang=EN-GB> and </span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>delete</span><span lang=EN-GB>
command, the indices </span><span class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>i</span></span><span lang=EN-GB> and </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>j</span><span lang=EN-GB> will
satisfy the condition 0&lt;=</span><span class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>i</span></span><span lang=EN-GB>&lt;=</span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>j</span><span lang=EN-GB>&lt;N, where
N is the array size before that command is executed. For each </span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>insert</span><span lang=EN-GB>
command, the index </span><span class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:
"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Courier 10 Pitch"'>i</span></span><span lang=EN-GB> will be between 0 and N
inclusive, where position N refers to the end of the array. Every other integer
in an insert command will be positive and small enough to fit in a signed
32-bit integer; </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>r</span><span
lang=EN-GB> will be &lt;=<span class=GramE>min(</span></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>n</span><span lang=EN-GB>,100). You
also may assume that C&lt;=500, and that the sum of the size (or <span
class=GramE>the '<span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:
"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>n</span>'</span> value)
of all inserts together will not exceed 2000000. The input ends with a 0 on a
line by itself, which should not be processed.</span></p>

<h2 style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
0in;mso-pagination:none;mso-hyphenate:none'>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>For each scenario, the output should
begin with a single line of the form </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:
"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Courier 10 Pitch"'>Scenario k:</span><span class=GramE><span lang=EN-GB>,</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB> where </span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>k</span><span
lang=EN-GB> is the scenario serial number, starting with 1 for the 1<sup>st</sup>
scenario, 2 for the 2<sup>nd</sup> scenario, and so on. This line should be
followed by one line of output for each </span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>sum</span><span lang=EN-GB> command,
with just the sum on the line by itself. The output for every scenario should
be followed by a blank line.</span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                           </span>Output for Sample
Input</span><span style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;

	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Enemy at the Gateway
</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>This is the year 9002, the war between
the Earth and Triton has broken out. Being a spy for the Earth, you are trying
to find all means to destroy Triton protections. Being a very smart spy, you
have somehow managed to enter into the Triton network and take over the control
of a gateway. Now, you are trying to decode the messages passed between them.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>o</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The messages are arbitrarily long
sequence of integers with a preamble of <b><i>P</i></b> integers. Each integer
will fit inside a 32 bit signed integer. You have managed to capture the actual
preamble. But, the communication lines are too noisy, and for this reason, you
can not get the sequence accurately. For each number in the sequence <span
class=SpellE><b><i>s<sub>i</sub></i></b></span>, you have determined that, it
can actually be any value between <b><i>p<sub>i</sub></i></b> and <span
class=SpellE><b><i>q<sub>i</sub></i></b></span> inclusive.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, given the sequence of numbers,
find in how many places, the message may start.</p>

<h2 align=left style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:left;mso-pagination:none;page-break-after:avoid;
mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:0in'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line contains <b><i>T</i></b>,
the number of test cases. Each test case starts with an integer <b><i>P</i></b>,
the length of the pattern. The next line contains <b><i>P</i></b> integers.
Next line contains 10 integers, <b><i>N</i></b>, <b><i>p<sub>0</sub></i></b>, <b><i>q<sub>0</sub></i></b>,
<b><i>A</i></b>, <b><i>B</i></b>, <b><i>C</i></b>, <b><i>D</i></b>, <b><i>E</i></b>,
<b><i>F</i></b>, <b><i>M</i></b>. <span class=GramE><b><i>N</i></b><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>is</span> the length of the sequence. The
range for each element in the sequence is generated using a generator function</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>p<sub>i</sub></span></span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'> = (A * p<sub>i-1</sub> + B
* q<sub>i-1</sub> + C) % M<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE><span
class=GramE><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>q<sub>i</sub></span></span></span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'> = (D * p<sub>i-1</sub> + E
* q<sub>i-1</sub> + F) % M<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>if(</span></span><span
class=SpellE><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>q<sub>i</sub></span></span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'> &lt; p<sub>i</sub>) swap(<span
class=SpellE>p<sub>i</sub>,q<sub>i</sub></span>)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>[p<sub>1</sub><span class=GramE>,q<sub>1</sub></span>],
[p<sub>2</sub>, q<sub>2</sub>],...,[<span class=SpellE>p<sub>N</sub>,q<sub>N</sub></span>]</span>
describes the sequence. Please note that <span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>[p<sub>0</sub><span
class=GramE>,q<sub>0</sub></span>]</span> is not included in the sequence</p>

<h2 align=left style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:left;mso-pagination:none;page-break-after:avoid;
mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:0in'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output the number of places, the
preamble may start.</p>

<h2 align=left style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0in;text-align:left;mso-pagination:none;page-break-after:avoid;
mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:0in'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Constraints<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>T &lt;= 100</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>P &lt;= 60</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>N &lt;= 1000000</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>0 &lt;= p<sub>0</sub>,q<sub>0</sub>,A,B,C,D,E,F,M
&lt;= 1000000000</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=626
 style='width:469.8pt;margin-left:-6.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:
 collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  6 12 1 0 2 0 1 2 100000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3
  1 3 1 0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span> 1 0 10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>In the first case.</span> <span
class=GramE>the</span> intervals are:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>[8<span class=GramE>,14</span>],[10,16],[12,18],[14,20]. The
value 10 can only be contained in the first two.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In the second case, all the intervals are [1<span
class=GramE>,3</span>], so, you can find two positions to start the preamble.</p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Verdana'>Problem setter: <span
class=SpellE>Manzurur</span> <span class=SpellE>Rahman</span> Khan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Verdana'>Special Thanks: <span
class=SpellE>Samee</span> <span class=SpellE>Zahur</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:Verdana'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

______________________________________________________

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
