    navy'>Blue</p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'>Invalid</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i>Figure: Some examples
of valid and invalid coloring, where M = 1, N = 1 and no forbidden cell.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input will start with an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T(T&lt;=50)</b> which indicates the number of test case. Each case will
start with two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0&lt;=M,
N&lt;=6</b>), number of horizontal lines and number of vertical lines. Next
line will contain an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> 0&lt;=K&lt;=(M+1)*(N+1)</b> ), which
indicates the number of forbidden cells. Each of the next K lines will contain
two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>x</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>y</b> (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1&lt;=x&lt;=M+1,
1&lt;=y&lt;=N+1</b>), representing one forbidden cell, which is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>yth</b> cell of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>xth</b> row. Each given forbidden cells are distinct.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output a single line in the form Case
#: P, where # will be replaced by the case number and P will be replaced by
the number of valid ways you can draw the given board. The result can be very
large you should output the result modulo 1000000007.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 36<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>

Setter: <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:State w:st="on">Md.</st1:State></st1:place> Arifuzzaman

</div>

	mso-list-name:WW8Num2;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
  EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all
  style='page-break-before:always'>
  <br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.55pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <h1><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact;font-style:normal;
  mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>             
  </span></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  36.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;font-style:normal;
  mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Crime Scene<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                       
  </span>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
  Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                     </span>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>You have been appointed as a programmer in your local police
station (they watch a lot of TV shows like CSI, Numb3rs etc., and though having
a computer genius among them would be pretty cool). They have given you a
desktop, Now, you can do all the impossible tasks, that are being done in the
shows frequently (like magnifying an image infinite times with no <span
class=apple-style-span><span style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>pixelation</span></span>,
or building systems, where the only way to reboot is to shut down the main
power of the building).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>But due to the recent increase in crime and also the
economic problems, the station is planning to make some budget cuts. One of the
cut is in the use of crime scene tapes. So, at each crime scene, they want to
use the minimal possible amount of tape.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t202"
  coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="202" path="m,l,21600r21600,l21600,xe">
  <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
  <v:path gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1063" type="#_x0000_t202" style='position:absolute;
  margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:243.2pt;height:228.7pt;z-index:1;
  mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;mso-position-horizontal:center'
  stroked="f">
  <v:fill color2="black"/>
  <v:textbox inset="0,0,0,0">
   <![if !mso]>
   <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 width="100%">
    <tr>
     <td><![endif]>
     <div>
     <p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
      coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
      filled="f" stroked="f">
      <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
      <v:formulas>
       <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
       <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
       <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
       <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
       <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
       <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
       <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
       <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
       <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
       <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
       <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
       <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
      </v:formulas>
      <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
      <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
     </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:243.75pt;
      height:195pt' filled="t">
      <v:fill color2="black"/>
      <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image005.png"  o:title=" />
     </v:shape></span>Two circles and a polygon in the crime scene. The optimal
     taping is shown in dark.</p>
     </div>
     <![if !mso]></td>
    </tr>
   </table>
   <![endif]></v:textbox>
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=329 height=309
 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image005.png" 
 alt="Text Box:  Two circles and a polygon in the crime scene. The optimal taping is shown in dark."
 v:shapes="_x0000_s1063"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>You are given all the objects in the crime scene. The
objects are all circular or in the shape of a polygon. Return the minimum
amount of crime scene tapes to surround them.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h3 style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
.5in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-pagination:none;page-break-after:avoid;mso-hyphenate:
none;tab-stops:list .5in'><span lang=SV style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
13.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span><span
lang=SV style='font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal>First line contains <i>T</i>, the number of test cases. Each
test case starts with <i>N</i>, the number of objects in the crime scene. Each
of the next <i>N</i> lines describe an object in the crime scene. The first
character in the line will be either <span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>'c'</span>
or <span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>'p'</span>, denoting whether the
object is a circle, or a polygon. If it is a circle, then, it will be followed
by 3 real numbers, <span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>(cx, cy) </span>the
center of the circle and radius of the circle.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In case of polygon, it will be followed by an integer <i>K</i>,
the number of sides the polygon will have, followed by <i>K</i> pairs of real
numbers, <i>(x<sub>i</sub>, y<sub>i</sub>)</i> the location of the <i>i</i>-th
vertex of the polygon.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>All polygons in this problem will be simple.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h2 align=left style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:.4in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.4in;mso-pagination:none;
mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .4in left 143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output</span><o:p></o:p></b></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output the case number and the optimal
length of the tape. Output 6 digits after the decimal point.</p>

<h2 align=left style='margin-top:12.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:.4in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.4in;mso-pagination:none;
mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .4in left 143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Constraints<o:p></o:p></span></b></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N </b>&lt;=
100</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b>
&lt;= 10</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>All radii will be greater than 0.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-pagination:
none;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;mso-hyphenate:none;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>All input values will be between -1000 and
+1000.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>          </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                   </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>c 0 0 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>p 4 -1 2 1 2 1
  -2 -1 -2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #1: 13.148009<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

	text-indent:-.25in;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Wingdings;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Wingdings;
	mso-bidi-font-family:OpenSymbol;}

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
  EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all
  style='page-break-before:always'>
  <br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=545 valign=top style='width:408.55pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Cost Cutting<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_s1064" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:4.3pt;
 width:182.25pt;height:189.75pt;z-index:1;visibility:visible;
 mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image007.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=243 height=253
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image007.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="Picture_x0020_1"><![endif]>Company
XYZ have been badly hit by recession and is taking a lot of cost cutting measures.
Some of these measures include giving up office space, going open source,
reducing incentives, cutting on luxuries and issuing pink slips.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>They have got three (3) employees
working in the accounts department and are going to lay-off two (2) of them.
After a series of meetings, they have decided to dislodge the person who gets
the most salary and the one who gets the least. This is usually the general
trend during crisis like this.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You will be given the salaries of
these 3 employees working in the accounts department. You have to find out the
salary of the person who survives.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The first line of input is an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T (T&lt;20)</b> that indicates the number of test cases. Each case
consists of a line with 3 distinct positive integers. These 3 integers
represent the salaries of the three employees. All these integers will be in
the range [1000, 10000].</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each case, output the case number followed by the salary
of the person who survives.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1000 2000 3000<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3000 2500 1500<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=TableContents style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1500 1200 1800</span><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Case 1: 2000<br>
  Case 2: 2500<br>
  Case 3: 1500<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem
Setter: Sohel Hafiz, Special Thanks: <st1:State w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Md.</st1:place></st1:State>
Arifuzzaman Arif <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
  EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all
  style='page-break-before:always'>
  <br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=547 valign=top style='width:410.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Alternate
  Task<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'>Little Hasan loves to play number games with his friends.
One day they were playing a game where one of them will speak out a positive number
and the others have to tell the sum of its factors. The first one to say it
correctly wins. After a while they got bored and wanted to try out a different
game. Hassan then suggested about trying the reverse. That is, given a positive
number <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b>, they have to find a number
whose factors add up to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b>. Realizing
that this task is tougher than the original task, Hasan came to you for
help.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Luckily Hasan owns a portable
programmable device and you have decided to burn a program to this device.
Given the value of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b> as input to the
program, it will output a number whose sum of factors equal to <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>Input</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>Each
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></span></b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'>case of input will consist of a positive integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S&lt;=1000. </b>The last case is followed
by a value of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b>.</span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial Narrow";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>Output</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>For
each case of input, there will be one line of output. It will be a positive
integer whose sum of factors is equal to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b>.
If there is more than one such integer, output the largest. If no such number
exists, output <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>-1</b>. Adhere to the
format shown in sample output.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 
</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<br>
  102<br>
  1000<br>
  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 1<br>
  Case 2: 101<br>
  Case 3: -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem
Setter: Shamim Hafiz, Special Thanks: Sohel Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;

 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:
  EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all
  style='page-break-before:always'>
  <br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=547 valign=top style='width:410.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Commando
  War</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  36.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b

  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>

</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;line-height:11.0pt'><b><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>Waiting for orders we held in the wood, word from the
front never came<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;line-height:11.0pt'><b><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>By evening the sound of the gunfire was miles away<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;line-height:11.0pt'><b><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>Ah softly we moved through the shadows, slip away
through the trees<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;line-height:11.0pt'><b><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>Crossing their lines in the mists in the fields on our
hands and our knees<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;line-height:11.0pt'><b><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>And all that I ever, was able to see<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;line-height:11.0pt'><b><i><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>The fire in the air, glowing red, silhouetting the
smoke on the breeze<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>There
is a war and it doesn't look very promising for your country. Now it's time to
act. You have a commando squad at your disposal and planning an ambush on an
important enemy camp located nearby. You have <b>N </b>soldiers in your squad.
In your master-plan, every single soldier has a unique responsibility and you
don't want any of your soldier to know the plan for other soldiers so that
everyone can focus on his task only. In order to enforce this, you brief every
individual soldier about his tasks separately and just before sending him to
the battlefield. You know that every single soldier needs a certain amount of
time to execute his job. You also know very clearly how much time you need to
brief every single soldier. Being anxious to finish the total operation as soon
as possible, you need to find an order of briefing your soldiers that will
minimize the time necessary for all the soldiers to complete their tasks. You
may assume that, no soldier has a plan that depends on the tasks of his
fellows. In other words, once a soldier<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>begins a task, he can finish it without the necessity of pausing in
between. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>There
will be multiple test cases in the input file. Every test case starts with an
integer <b>N (1&lt;=N&lt;=1000)</b>, denoting the number of soldiers. Each of
the following N lines describe a soldier with two integers <b>B
(1&lt;=B&lt;=10000) </b>&amp; <b>J (1&lt;=J&lt;=10000)</b>. <b>B </b>seconds
are needed to brief the soldier while completing his job needs <b>J </b>seconds.
The end of input will be denoted by a case with <b>N =0 .</b> This case should
not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
each test case, print a line in the format, Case X: Y, where X is the case
number &amp; Y is the total number of seconds counted from the start of your
first briefing till the completion of all jobs.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                       </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                        </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=678
 style='width:508.65pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:117.4pt'>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:117.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>5 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=255 valign=top style='width:191.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:117.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><a name="DDE_LINK"><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: </span></a><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: 15<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=547 valign=top style='width:410.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Number Transformation</span></b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>You are given an integer number <b>S</b>. You
can transform any integer number A to another integer number B by adding x to A.
This x is an integer number which is a prime factor of A (Please note that 1
and A are not being considered as a factor of A). Now, your task is to find the
minimum number of transformations required to transform S to another integer
number <b>T</b>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each test case, there will be a line with
two integers, <b>S</b> (<b>1&lt;=S&lt;=100</b>) &amp; <b>T</b> (<b>1&lt;=T&lt;=1000</b>),
as described above. The last test case will be followed by a line with two 0 s
denoting end of output. This case should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Output</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
every test case except the last one, print a line of the form Case X: Y where
X is the serial number of output (starting from 1). Y is the minimum number of
transformations required to transform <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>S</b>
to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>. If it is not possible to make
T from S with the given rules, Y shall be -1.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=678
 style='width:508.65pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.9pt'>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.9pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>6 12<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>6 13<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=255 valign=top style='width:191.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.9pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b>Explanation
of case 1: </b>You can make 12 from 6 in 2 steps in this way: 6-&gt;9-&gt;12.</p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem Setter:
Mohammad Mahmudur Rahman, Special Thanks: <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:State
 w:st="on">Md.</st1:State></st1:place> Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=543 valign=top style='width:407.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Ex-circles</span></b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1065" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:5.25pt;width:261.6pt;height:295.2pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/i_files/image009.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=349 height=394
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/i_files/image009.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1065"><![endif]>In
the figure on the right you can see triangle ABC and its in-circle (Circle that
touches all the sides of a triangle internally) and three ex-circles (Circles that
touch one side internally and other two sides externally). D, E and F are
centers of the ex-circles. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the length of the sides of
triangle ABC, you will have to find the area of triangle DEF and also the total
area of the three grey shaded regions.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file can contain up to
6000 lines of inputs. Each line contains three positive integer numbers a, b, c
which denotes the length of the sides of the triangle ABC. You can assume that
these three sides can form a valid triangle (positive area) and none of the
side length is greater than 1000.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
containing three zeroes.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the serial of output
followed by two floating-point numbers. The first one denotes the area of
triangle DEF and second one denotes the total area of the three gray shaded
regions. This floating-point numbers should have two digits after the decimal
point. You can assume that small precision errors will not cause difference in
the printed output.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:34.45pt'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:230.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:34.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3 4 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10 11 12<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=335 valign=top style='width:251.6pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:34.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 30.00 21.62<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: 211.37 144.73<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem
Setter: Shahriar Manzoor, Special Thanks: Sohel Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>J<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=543 valign=top style='width:407.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>strcmp() Anyone?</span></b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>strcmp() is a library function in
C/C++ which compares two strings. It takes two strings as input parameter and
decides which one is lexicographically larger or smaller: If the first string
is greater then it returns a positive value, if the second string is greater it
returns a negative value and if two strings are equal it returns a zero. The
code that is used to compare two strings in C/C++ library is shown below:</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:191;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=367 valign=top style='width:275.4pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>int</span></b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'> strcmp(<b>char</b> *s, <b>char</b> *t)<br>
  {<br>
  <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span><b>int</b> i;<br>
  <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span><b>for</b> (i=0; s[i]==t[i]; i++)<br>
  <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>        </span>if (s[i]=='\0')<br>
  <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>            </span><b>return</b> 0;<br>
  <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span><b>return</b> s[i] - t[i];<br>
  }<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=367 valign=top style='width:275.4pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure: The standard strcmp()
  code provided for this problem.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The number of comparisons
required to compare two strings in strcmp() function is never returned by the
function. But for this problem you will have to do just that at a larger scale.
strcmp() function continues to compare characters in the same position of the
two strings until two different characters are found or both strings come to an
end. Of course it assumes that last character of a string is a null (\0) character.
For example the table below shows what happens when than and that; therE
and the are compared using strcmp() function. To understand how 7 comparisons
are needed in both cases please consult the code block given above. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0

  font-family:"Arial Narrow"'>7 Comparisons<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:"Arial Narrow"'>Returns positive value<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:"Arial Narrow"'>7 Comparisons<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains maximum 10
sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set starts with an integer N
(0&lt;N&lt;4001) which denotes the total number of strings. Each of the next N
lines contains one string. Strings contain only alphanumerals (0
 9, A

Z, a
 z) have a maximum length of 1000, and a minimum length of 1. <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input is terminated by a line containing a single zero.
Input file size is around 23 MB.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the serial of output
followed by an integer T. This T denotes the total number of comparisons that
are required in the strcmp() function if all the strings are compared with one
another exactly once. So for N strings the function strcmp() will be called exactly
<span style='position:relative;top:12.0pt;mso-text-raise:-12.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:50.25pt;
 height:32.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/j_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=67 height=43
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/j_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1320997469">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>times. You have to
calculate total number of comparisons inside the strcmp() function in those <span
style='position:relative;top:12.0pt;mso-text-raise:-12.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:50.25pt;height:32.25pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/j_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=67 height=43
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/j_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1320997470">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>calls. You can assume
that the value of T will fit safely in a 64-bit signed integer. Please note
that the most straightforward solution (Worst Case Complexity O(N<sup>2</sup>
*1000)) will time out for this problem.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>a<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>b<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>cat<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>hat<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>mat<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>sir<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 6<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

style='font-family:Arial'>
