<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1053" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:1.55pt;width:192pt;height:158.25pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=256 height=211
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/a_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1053"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>The government of a certain developing nation wants to
improve transportation in one of its most inaccessible areas, in an attempt to attract
investment. The region consists of several important locations that must have
access to an airport. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Of
course, one option is to build an airport in each of these places, but it may
turn out to be cheaper to build fewer airports and have roads link them to all
of the other locations. Since these are long distance roads connecting major
locations in the country (e.g. cities, large villages, industrial areas), all
roads are two-way. Also, there may be more than one direct road possible
between two areas. This is because there may be several ways to link two areas
(e.g. one road tunnels through a mountain while the other goes around it etc.)
with possibly differing costs.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>A
location is considered to have access to an airport either if it contains an airport
or if it is possible to travel by road to another location from there that has
an airport.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>You
are given the cost of building an airport and a list of possible roads between
pairs of locations and their corresponding costs. The government now needs your
help to decide on the cheapest way of ensuring that every location has access
to an airport. The aim is to make airport access as easy as possible, so if
there are several ways of getting the minimal cost, choose the one that has the
most airports.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Note:
The input file is large; make sure your I/O code is fast.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
first line of input contains the integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>&lt;25), the number of test cases. The
rest of the input consists of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>
cases.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Each
case starts with three integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>A</b> (0&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>&lt;=10,000,
0&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b>&lt;=100,000, 0&lt;<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A</b>&lt;=10,000) separated by white space.
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> is the number of locations, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> is the number of possible roads that
can be built, and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A</b> is the cost of
building an airport. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
following <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> lines each contain three
integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Y</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>C</b> (1&lt;=<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b>&lt;=<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>, 0&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>C</b>&lt;=10,000), separated by white space. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>X</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b> are two
locations, and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>C</b> is the cost of
building a road between <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Output</span></b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Your
program should output exactly <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>
lines, one for each case. Each line should be of the form &quot;Case #X: <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Z</b>&quot;,
where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X</b> is the case number <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b> is the minimum cost of making roads
and airports so that all locations have access to at least one airport, and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Z</b> is the number of airports to be
built. As mentioned earlier, if there are several answers with minimal cost,
choose the one that maximizes the number of airports.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4 100<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 20<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b

	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoHeader, li.MsoHeader, div.MsoHeader
	{mso-style-noshow:yes;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:center 3.0in right 6.0in;
	font-size:10.0pt;

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>B</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Big Number of Teams will Solve
  This<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1058" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:3.05pt;width:196.5pt;height:198pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/b_files/image003.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=262 height=264
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/b_files/image003.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1058"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Writing up a code in Programming
Contest for an easy problem isnt a big task but inexperienced contestants do
not know that their output must match exactly with that of the judges. Very
often they output extra spaces in their output because they feel it makes the
presentation better. The requirement in reality is the output must match
character per character with that of the judges. Submitted <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>runs </i>that give additional spaces are given the verdict Output
Format Error. If the output still mismatches after ignoring the spaces, it is
given the verdict Wrong Answer. A verdict of Yes is given when the output
matches exactly. In this problem, you will have to determine the verdict for
runs given the team output and the judges output.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>The
first line of input consists of a positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>t&lt;20, </b>where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t</b> denotes
the number of test cases.<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </b>Each case
consists of two lines. The first line is the teams output and the second line
is the judges output. Each line consists of at least one and at most <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>20 </b>characters. The teams output
consists of alphabets and spaces. The judges output consists of alphabets only.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>For
each case of input, there will be one line of output. It will first contain the
case number followed by the verdict. Look at sample output for exact
formatting.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<br>
  yes<br>
  yes<br>
  Casematters<br>
  casematters<br>
  no space<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>        </span>please<br>
  nospaceplease<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: Yes<br>
  Case 2: Wrong Answer<br>
  Case 3: Output Format Error<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

h2
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-outline-level:2;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}

	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-outline-level:3;

	letter-spacing:3.0pt;
	text-shadow:auto;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
	font-weight:normal;}

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>C</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:48.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Corner
  the <st1:place w:st="on">Queens</st1:place></span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1054" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:11.6pt;width:210.65pt;
 height:197.35pt;z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/c_files/image005.jpg"  o:title="Queen_image"/>
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=281 height=263
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/c_files/image005.jpg"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1054"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Corner
the queen is a game played on n x n chess like board with two players. The rows
and columns are numbered from 0 to n - 1. Then a queen is placed on a random
cell other than (0, 0).<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each player
gives one move of the queen towards the cell (0, 0). The move is like a chess
queen. As you know a queen can move any number of cells horizontally,
vertically or diagonally. In Formal a player can move a queen from cell (a1,
b1) to cell (a2, b2) if (a1 = a2 or b1 = b2 or |a1a2| = |b1b2|). Moreover in
this game, move that takes queen away from the cell (0, 0) horizontally or
vertically or diagonally is not allowed. Formally, if a player moves queen from
cell (a1, b1) to (a2, b2) then (a2 &#8804; a1 and b2 &#8804; b1) must be held.
The player who first reaches the cell (0, 0) is the winner. Now you may already
have guessed if both the players play optimally, the starting position
determines the winner. For some cell like (2, 0) player 1 always wins and for
some cell like (1, 2) player 2 always wins. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>In
this problem we consider an infinite chess board for playing the game. A
rectangular region is specified. A cell from that region will be picked
randomly as a starting position for the queen. All you have to find is the
probability that player 1 wins assuming that both players will play optimally.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
first line of input will be a number <b>T</b> (<b>T</b> &#8804; 15000) the
number of test cases. Each of the following <b>T</b> lines will contain four
integers <b>x1</b>, <b>y1</b>, <b>x2</b>, <b>y2</b> (0 &#8804; <b>x1</b> &#8804;
<b>x2</b> &#8804; 1000000, 0 &#8804; <b>y1</b> &#8804; <b>y2</b> &#8804;
1000000). Here (<b>x1</b>, <b>y1</b>) is the lower left and (<b>x2</b>, <b>y2</b>)
is the upper right portion of the rectangle. The lowest-leftmost cell is (0, 0)
and it is always outside the given rectangle.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>For
each line of input produce one line of output in the format </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Board
X: n / d</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>. Here X is the number of case,
n and d is the numerator and denominator of the probability expressed in
reduced form. See the sample input and output for illustration.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3<br>
  1 0 2 2<br>
  1 0 7 0<br>
  1 2 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Board 1: 2 / 3<br>
  Board 2: 1 / 1<br>
  Board 3: 0 / 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Verdana'>Problem setter: <st1:State w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Md.</st1:place></st1:State> Towhidul Islam Special Thanks: Md.
Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>D</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:48.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Debugging
  RAM</span></b><b><span style='font-size:48.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_s1055" type="#_x0000_t75"
 alt="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_b5jbNCD3SeE/SFeJ6ViEK2I/AAAAAAAAAC8/55D3xA7HTPc/s320/cartoon_mechanic.gif"
 style='position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:2.7pt;
 width:209.25pt;height:182.25pt;z-index:1;visibility:visible;
 mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image007.png"  o:title="cartoon_mechanic"/>
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=279 height=243
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image007.png"  align=left hspace=12
alt="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_b5jbNCD3SeE/SFeJ6ViEK2I/AAAAAAAAAC8/55D3xA7HTPc/s320/cartoon_mechanic.gif"
v:shapes="Picture_x0020_1"><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>You are
working in a robot factory. You are responsible to write programs that run in
the hardware of robots. You have implemented your first program into a robot and
turn the robot on. But your robot is not acting according to your program. You
have decided to debug your program. To do so, you have opened the robots brain
and created a copy of the whole RAM. The RAM contains different things like
interrupt service routines, functions, variables etc. You are interested to
look into what the variables hold at a particular time. But since it is a
tedious task, you have decided to write another program to simplify your task.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Garamond'>Input and Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>There
will be several test cases in the input file. The first line of each test case
starts with two positive integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>b
&lt;= 8</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>v &lt;= 200</b>, where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>b</b> is the number of bits in a byte and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>v</b> is the total number of variables in
the RAM. These two integers will be separated by a single space. Each of the
next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>v</b> lines will contain a variable
name, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>s<sub>i</sub></b>, and number of
bytes that variable will occupy in RAM, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>t<sub>i</sub></b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &lt;= i &lt;= v </b>and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &lt;= t<sub>i</sub> &lt;= 8</b>. A
variable name consists of lower case and upper case letters and the length of a
variable name is not more than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>20</b>.
Variable names are case sensitive. It is guaranteed that no two variable names
are same in a set and all variables are unsigned. From the next line contents
of the RAM will start. There will be exactly </span><!--[if supportFields]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><span style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>QUOTE </span><sub><![if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:33pt;height:14.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image007.png"  o:title="  chromakey="white"/>
</v:shape><![endif]><![if !vml]><img width=44 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image007.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><span
style='mso-element:field-separator'></span></span><![endif]--><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:33pt;height:14.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image007.png"  o:title="  chromakey="white"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=44 height=19
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image007.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if supportFields]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span></span><![endif]--><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>lines and each
line will have exactly <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>b</b> characters.
Each character in the RAM is either 0 or 1. First t<sub>1</sub> lines are value
for the variable s<sub>1</sub>, next t<sub>2</sub> lines are value for the
variable s<sub>2</sub> and so on. RAM contents are aligned as most significant
byte first. Next line will have single integer, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>1 &lt;= q &lt;= v</b>, number of variables for which you need to output
the content of variable. Next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>q</b>
lines will each have a variable name. These variable names may or may not be
one of the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>s<sub>i</sub></b>s. If it is
one of the <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>s<sub>i</sub></b>, output the
variable name, and equal sign = (quotes for clarity only), and contents of
the variable (in unsigned decimal number). If the queried variable name is not
one of those <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>s<sub>i</sub></b>s, then
output the variable name and equal sign only. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>For
clarification, see sample input and output.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>ab 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:

  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1111<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1111<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>0101<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1010<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1010<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:

 /* Page Definitions */
 @page
	{mso-footnote-separator:url("e_files/header.html") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("e_files/header.html") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("e_files/header.html") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("e_files/header.html") ecs;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:1.0in 1.0in 1.0in 1.0in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-even-header:url("e_files/header.html") eh1;
	mso-header:url("e_files/header.html") h1;
	mso-footer:url("e_files/header.html") f1;
	mso-first-header:url("e_files/header.html") fh1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}

	{mso-style-name:"Table Grid";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	border:solid black 1.0pt;
	mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid black;
	mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Extreme Primitive Society<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:17.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Do
not be misled by the name. Primitive society is a community of very advanced
intelligent unisexual beings, called the primitives. The reason that they are
called primitives is that they are all primitive geometric shapes, rectangles.
Every member of the primitive society have two genetic traits, <b>width(w)</b>
and <b>height(h)</b>, both can be expressed as positive integers. The primitive
society have in fact so advanced in science and technology that, now they
reproduce only through the means of genetic engineering. Their reproduction
system works as follow.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Two
primitives deposit their gene samples in a Generation Creating Machine (GCM).
The GCM then performs genetic engineering tasks to produce up to <b>4</b>
offspring. Say the parent primitives had genetic traits <b>(w1,h1)</b> and <b>(w2,h2)</b>
respectively. Then the <b>4</b> offspring would have genetic traits <b>(w1,h1)</b>
, <b>(w2,h2)</b> , <b>(w1,h2)</b> and <b>(w2,h1)</b> respectively. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shapetype
  id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
  path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
  <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
  <v:formulas>
   <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
  </v:formulas>
  <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
  <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
 </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1063" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
  left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:60.75pt;margin-top:0;width:333pt;height:170.45pt;
  z-index:1'>
  <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image011.png"  o:title="primitive 1" cropbottom="13498f"/>
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0>
  <tr>
   <td width=81 height=0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=444 height=227 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image011.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1063"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
<span style='font-size:12.0pt'>After this, a mutation is performed but this is
optional and GCM decided this randomly. The mutation process is defined as the
incrementing or decrementing of <b>h</b> value by <b>1</b> and / or
incrementing or decrementing of <b>w</b> value by <b>1.</b> And thus, a new
generation of primitives is born. See fig. for better understanding of the
procedure.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Due
to their scientific advancements, the primitives have become immune to
everything except the weather change. Therefore, they do not need to reproduce
very often to ensure survival of their species. Once in ten years or so they
deposit their gene samples to the GCM. Say there are <b>n</b> people in the
current generation, then the GCM uses the genes from every individual of the
current generation with every other individual performing <b>n(n-1)/2</b>
mating. The GCM can also apply mutation on some of the resulting offspring to
increase their fitness. A primitive is considered absolutely fit if both of its
genetic traits have same value, i.e. the rectangle is a square.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Note
that, although <b>n(n-1)/2</b> mating are performed, at most <b>2n(n-1)</b>
offspring are born in the next generation. Why up to <b>2n(n-1)</b>, not
exactly <b>2n(n-1)</b> ? Because they dont have any need for people with
redundant genetic configurations and the GCM makes sure that only one person of
each possible genetic configuration will remain in the society.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:384.75pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>                                                                                                                                </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Given
an initial population of primitives, your job is to calculate the minimum
number of generations should pass before an absolutely fit individual is born
in this society.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>There
will be multiple test Cases, not more than <b>1010</b>. Each case starts with
an integer <b>n(&gt;=2)</b> on a line by itself. This is the number of
individuals in the initial population. Following will be n lines, each having <b>2</b>
positive integers representing the genetic configuration of each individual of
the society. All numbers will be positive integers not exceeding <b>100</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>For
each test case of input, print one line of output beginning with <b>Case x : </b>
where x is the test case number. This text should be followed by the minimum
number of generations required before an absolutely fit individual is born in
this society.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>35
  40<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>30
  35<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>32
  44<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>35
  68<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>70
  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>79
  25</span></b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1 : 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2 : 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Verdana'>Problem setter: Raiyan Kamal Special Thanks: Sabbir
Yousuf<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

	{mso-style-next:Normal;

	mso-outline-level:5;

	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;

	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
	font-weight:normal;}
h6
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	line-height:150%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-outline-level:6;
	font-size:16.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Bookman Old Style";
	letter-spacing:3.0pt;
	text-shadow:auto;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}

</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br
  clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>F</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:30.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Few Teams will Solve This<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><span
style='color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1059" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:6.7pt;width:112.5pt;height:111pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/f_files/image013.jpg"  o:href="http://www.chumpysclipart.com/images/illustrations/thumbnail/2154_picture_of_a_sad_bear_holding_deflated_balloons.jpg"/>
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=150 height=148
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/f_files/image013.jpg"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1059"><![endif]><span
class=apple-style-span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'>You have just
finished a compiler design homework question where you had to find the parse
tree of an expression. Unfortunately you left your assignment in the library,
but luckily your friend picked it up for you. Instead of e-mailing you the
parse tree so that you can rewrite the solution, your friend decides to play a
practical joke and sends you just the DFS and BFS trace. Rather than trying to
redo the entire question you decide to reconstruct the tree. But doing that you
realize there could be more than one tree that produces the given DFS and BFS
trace.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'>Can you find out how many trees produce
the given DFS and BFS trace?</span></span> <span class=apple-style-span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=apple-style-span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond;color:black'>Input</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond;color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
color:black'>The input file contains several test cases as described below.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'>The first line
of the input is the number&nbsp;<b>n</b>&nbsp;(1 &lt;=&nbsp;<b>n</b>&nbsp;&lt;=
1000) of nodes in the tree. The nodes in the tree are numbered 1, 2, ...,&nbsp;<b>n</b>.
The remaining numbers are the BFS traversal followed by the DFS traversal. Note
that when a parent was expanded the children were traversed in ascending order.
The last line of input is a case where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>
= 0 and that doesnt need to be processed.</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
mso-outline-level:3'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:black'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;color:black'>For each case, output the case number
first followed by the required result. Since the result could be very big,
output the result modulo 19821202.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>4 3 5 1 2 8 7 6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>4 3 1 7 2 6 5 8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>1 2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>0</span></b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 1<br>
  Case 2: 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>G</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Garamond'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Giving Candies<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1057" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:3.55pt;width:168.4pt;height:175.6pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image014.jpg"  o:href="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_lMon8DWowpQ/SK9rvuyL-MI/AAAAAAAABYM/8vx0iXBFbds/s400/candy1w.jpg"/>
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=225 height=234
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image014.jpg"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1057"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>Two siblings are trying to figure out a way of sharing
a packet of candy. They would like to divide it as equally as possible. The
problem is that they are all attached into one continuous strip. Sharing it
would involve breaking the strip into smaller pieces containing one or more
individual candies. The candies themselves are not all the same, thus in a
totally fair distribution, each sibling must get an equal number of the same
type of candy. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>But,
being small children, they also have some additional (and more annoying)
demands. Each sibling must get exactly one whole segment broken off from the
main strip, and that one segment must contain all the candies that form his
share. The child will not accept more than one segment for his or her share.
What is more, the order of the candies from left to right in one childs
segment must be exactly the same as that in other childs (and rotating the
strip is not allowed), otherwise they have difficulty verifying that they have
got a fair distribution. So both segments must be exactly the same. To make
matters worse, there are certain types of candies that neither sibling wants.
Those candies cannot be in the segment handed to the children, because they
consider any segment containing those candies to be ruined.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Your
job is, given a large strip of candy and a list of bad candies, identify the
largest contiguous segment that occurs at least twice (the two occurrences
cannot overlap, obviously) and does not have any bad candies in it. Any left
over candy is discarded. If there are no such segments in the strip, the whole
strip is discarded and the children get nothing.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
first line of input contains a single integer <b>N</b> (<b>N</b>&lt;=50). <b>N</b>
cases follow. Each case consists of exactly two lines. The first line is a
non-empty string (1&lt;=length&lt;=1000) describing one large strip of candy.
Each candy is given a unique character that is either a lower case or upper
case English letter (a to z or A to Z, both ranges inclusive). The
second line is a string of characters corresponding to bad candies. Like the
first line, this string consists of upper or lower case English letters. But in
some cases there may not be any bad candies (i.e. there are no candy types that
the children dont like), and the second line will be an empty line instead.
Furthermore, each candy can occur only once in the list of bad candies (no
duplicates). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Each
candy corresponds to exactly one unique letter, so upper case and lower case
forms of the same character denote different candies (i.e. a and A are not
the same candy).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Your
program should print exactly <b>N</b> lines of output, one for each input case.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Each
line should be of the form Case #X: Y, where X is the case number and Y is
the size of the largest segment that at least two non-overlapping occurrences
and has no bad candies in it. If there is no such segment, Y is zero.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Garamond'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>ABADZEDGBADEZ<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>ZEG<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>CaNdY<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>baaaa<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>a<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
