<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:55.7pt'>
  <td width=106 style='width:79.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid black .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>E</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=437 style='width:327.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:32.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Bounded by Lines<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=111 style='width:83.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:81pt;
   height:79.5pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=108 height=106
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="PBrush" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1324936803">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>You are asked to write a program to plot a set of lines.
Since, the dimension of the screen is <span class=GramE>finite,</span> you want
to show a portion of the plot.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_3"
  o:spid="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
  margin-left:38.3pt;margin-top:0;width:399.3pt;height:182.7pt;z-index:1;
  visibility:visible;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0'
  filled="t">
  <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0>
  <tr>
   <td width=51 height=0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=532 height=244 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="Picture_x0020_3"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
<span class=SpellE>Lets</span> say, you have some lines, and want to show the
portion between x=0 and x=10. Lines are infinitely long, but you only need to
consider the portion you are going to show. Find the area bounded by the lines
within this region. An area bounded by line may be defined as the set of
points, for which, there is at least one line above it, and at least one line
below it.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The shaded area in the graph is the area bounded by lines
within the region x=0 and x=10.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input starts with an integer <span class=GramE>T(</span>1&lt;=
T&lt;=10), the number of test cases. This is followed by T test cases, each
starts with an integer <span class=GramE>N(</span>2&lt;=N&lt;=100000), the
number of lines to follow. Next N lines each contain 4 real numbers, x<sub>1</sub>,
y<sub>1</sub>, x<sub>2</sub>, y<sub>2</sub>,(-10001 &lt; x<sub>1</sub>,y<sub>1</sub>,x<sub>2</sub>,y<sub>2</sub>
&lt; 10001) denoting a line between the points (x<sub>1</sub>,y<sub>1</sub>)
and (x<sub>2</sub>,y<sub>2</sub>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The description of lines is followed by two integers <span
class=GramE>x<sub>l</sub></span> and <span class=SpellE>x<sub>u</sub></span> (-10001
&lt; x<sub>l</sub>, <span class=SpellE>x<sub>u</sub></span> &lt; 10001).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>There will be a blank line before each test case.</p>

<h2 style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;
mso-hyphenate:none'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output the area bounded by the lines,
within the region [<span class=SpellE>x<sub>l</sub><span class=GramE>,x<sub>u</sub></span></span>].
You can assume that, the output will never exceed 10<sup>9</sup>. Output having
difference by no more than 0.001 with the official output shall be considered
as correct.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=TableContents><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

  <w:Compatibility>
   <w:BreakWrappedTables/>

   <w:WrapTextWithPunct/>
   <w:UseAsianBreakRules/>
   <w:DontGrowAutofit/>
   <w:DontUseIndentAsNumberingTabStop/>

   <w:WW11IndentRules/>
   <w:DontAutofitConstrainedTables/>
   <w:AutofitLikeWW11/>
   <w:HangulWidthLikeWW11/>
   <w:UseNormalStyleForList/>
  </w:Compatibility>
  <w:BrowserLevel>MicrosoftInternetExplorer4</w:BrowserLevel>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:55.7pt'>
  <td width=106 style='width:79.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid black .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>F</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=437 style='width:327.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:32.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Winger
  Trial</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:32.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=122 style='width:91.8pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>

    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1324936848">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>After the
great winger <span class=SpellE>Donaldo</span> left his soccer team, coach sir <span
class=SpellE>Thelex</span> has found himself in a great fix. The strength of
his team is reduced greatly and he needs to find a suitable replacement
immediately. The coach selects a number of young wingers from around the world
and sets up a trial for them. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>The trial will
take place on a rectangular shaped field of length <b>L </b>meters &amp; width <b>W
</b>meters. There are <b>N </b>robot defenders placed on the field. The
defenders do not change their positions but if a winger's distance from a
defender is not more than <b>d</b> meters, it will automatically tackle him. A
robot defender may tackle at most once. On the beginning of the trial, a winger
stands on the left edge of the field (across the length) with a soccer ball.
Now, his task is to avoid the obstructions of the robot defenders and reach the
rightmost edge of the field with the ball. Please tell him the minimum number
of tackles he must face in order to reach the opposite end. A player must not
go outside the field or he will be disqualified.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>Every test
case begins with 4 integers, <b>L (1&lt;=L&lt;=10000), W (1&lt;=W&lt;=10000), N
(1&lt;=N&lt;=100) </b>&amp; <b>d (1&lt;=d&lt;=1000)</b>, as described above.
Each of the following <b>N </b>lines contain 2 integers each, defining the <b>x
</b>&amp; <b>y </b>co-ordinates of a defender. You can consider the co-ordinate
of the lower-left corner of the field to be <b>(0<span class=GramE>,0</span>)</b>
and upper-right corner to be <b>(L,W)</b>. Obviously, all the defenders are
located inside the field.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>The end of
input will be marked by a case with <b>L=W=N=d=0</b>. This case should not be
processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>For each test
case, print a line in the format, Case X: Y, where X is the case number &amp;
Y is the minimum number of tackles that needs to be dealt with.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal;layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>500 300 5 100<br>
  250 0<br>
  250 150<br>
  250 300<br>
  100 150<br>
  400 150<br>
  0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><a name="DDE_LINK"><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: </span></b></a><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:55.7pt'>
  <td width=106 style='width:79.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid black .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>G</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=437 style='width:327.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:32.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Left
  Right</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:32.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=122 style='width:91.8pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:81pt;
   height:79.5pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=108 height=106
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="PBrush" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1324936990">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>Since you have
been participating in programming contests and problem solving for quite a long
time, I think most of you know about Alice and Bob :). They are responsible for
inventing new games on various occasions. This time, they are back with a new
game again.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>This new game
is played in a one-dimensional board. The board contains <b><i>N</i></b> cells.
The cells are numbered from 0 to <b><i>N</i></b>-1, where the left most cell is
marked as cell 0. Each cell can contain at most one piece. There are two kinds
of pieces, gray and white. Alice moves all gray pieces, and bob moves all white
ones. The <span class=GramE>pieces</span> alternate, that is, leftmost piece is
gray, next is white, next to that is gray, then it's white again, and so on.
There will always be equal number of black and gray pieces.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shape
  id="Picture_x0020_5" o:spid="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
  left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:266.3pt;height:26.15pt;
  z-index:1;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;
  mso-wrap-distance-right:0;mso-position-horizontal:center' filled="t">
  <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=355 height=35
 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="Picture_x0020_5"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
At each move, the player selects at least one, and at most <b><i>d</i></b> of <span
class=SpellE>it's</span> pieces and move each one, either to <span
class=SpellE><span class=GramE>it's</span></span> left or to <span
class=SpellE>it's</span> right, any number of cells (at least 1). Please note
that, in each move, you can move some pieces left, and some pieces right, and
also, you can keep some pieces unmoved, as long as, you move at least one of
your pieces. But, it can neither jump over other pieces, nor it can move
outside the board. The players alternate their moves.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>For example,
if Alice decides to move the left most gray piece, these two moves are
available to her.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:39.2pt'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.3pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:39.2pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shape
    id="Picture_x0020_6" o:spid="_x0000_s1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
    margin-left:2.55pt;margin-top:0;width:243.55pt;height:23.85pt;z-index:2;
    visibility:visible;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0'
    filled="t">
    <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
    <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
   </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout'>
   <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0>
    <tr>
     <td width=3 height=0></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
     <td></td>
     <td><img width=325 height=32 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="Picture_x0020_6"></td>
    </tr>
   </table>
   </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
  style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
  </p>
  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.7pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:39.2pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="Picture_x0020_7" o:spid="_x0000_s1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
   margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:243.55pt;height:44.6pt;z-index:3;
   visibility:visible;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
   mso-position-horizontal:center;mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;
   mso-position-vertical-relative:text' filled="t">
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
   <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=325 height=59
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/g_files/image001.png"  align=left v:shapes="Picture_x0020_7"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.3pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><i>Moving the gray piece
  to the left<o:p></o:p></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.7pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><i>Moving the gray piece
  to the right<o:p></o:p></i></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>Alice moves
first. The game ends, when someone is unable to make any move, and loses the
game. You can assume that, both of them play optimally (that is, if it is
possible to apply a strategy that will ensure <span class=SpellE>someones</span>
win, they will always use that strategy).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>Although, in
most occasions, they want to know, given the state of the game, who will win
that <span class=GramE>game.</span> But you are not required to find that here.
Instead, Alice and Bob wrote a computer program to assist them in playing this
game. The program generates the positions of all pieces randomly (the program
always generate valid positions, that is no two piece are on the same cell, and
the colors of the pieces alternate).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>You are asked
that, given the size of the board, and the number of gray and white pieces, how
many different configurations ensure that Alice will <span class=GramE>win?</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of input contains an
integer <span class=GramE><b>T(</b></span><b>&lt;=100)</b> the number of test
cases. Each of the next T lines contain three integers, <span class=GramE><b>N(</b></span><b>1&lt;=N&lt;=10000),
K(1&lt;=K&lt;=100, K&lt;=N) </b>and <b>d(1&lt;=d&lt;=K)</b>, where <b>N</b> is
the size of the board, and <b>K</b> is the number of pieces, and <b>d</b> is
the maximum number of piece to move. <b>K</b> will always be an even number.</p>

<h2 style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;
mso-hyphenate:none'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output the
number configurations, where Alice wins. The result can be very large. So,
output the number modulo 1000000007.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=665
 style='width:499.0pt;margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:
 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.3pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.7pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.3pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>

  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width=333 valign=top style='width:249.7pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 align=right
 width=323 style='width:241.9pt;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-table-overlap:never;mso-table-lspace:

 mso-table-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-table-anchor-horizontal:margin;
 mso-table-left:right;mso-table-top:-.9pt;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;
 mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;page-break-inside:avoid;
  height:144.95pt'>
  <td width=323 rowspan=2 valign=top style='width:241.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 1.45pt 0cm 1.45pt;
  height:144.95pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:
  9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;
  mso-element-anchor-horizontal:margin;mso-element-left:right;mso-element-top:
  -.9pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"
   type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:233.25pt;height:303pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/h_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=311 height=404
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/h_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:144.95pt;border:none' width=0 height=193></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;page-break-inside:avoid;height:80.3pt'>
  <span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;
  font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-bidi-font-family:Vrinda;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
  EN-US;mso-bidi-language:BN-BD'><![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:80.3pt;border:none' width=0 height=107></td>
  <![endif]></span>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;page-break-inside:avoid;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=323 valign=top style='width:241.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0cm 1.45pt 0cm 1.45pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:
  9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;
  mso-element-anchor-horizontal:margin;mso-element-left:right;mso-element-top:
  -.9pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'>Figure 1: A fence plan. The steel fences are
  drawn with gray lines and the wooden fences are drawn with brown dashed
  lines. This figure corresponds to the first sample input and output.</p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:49.85pt;border:none' width=0 height=66></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>The Indigenous
Barrier Makers (IBM) <span class=GramE>are</span> out in the jungle of the
Amazon to make fences for the people living there. Many new inhabitants are
coming to stay there so IBM has to build many fences. But all the fences are
not of the same type; there are some wooden fences and some steel fences. And
the cost of making the steel fence is much higher than the wooden fence. So IBM
wants to build wooden fence whenever it is possible to minimize the total cost.
But ACM (Association of Consumer-right Monitoring) is more than concerned about
the safety of the people and about saving trees. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>With the
adverse effect of climate change around the world, wild fire is a common threat
now, so wooden fence is sometimes very risky in places like Amazon. Also make
wooden fence we need a lot of woods which eventually destroys a lot of trees.
Therefore fences are built in layers for the inhabitants for better protection,
safety and privacy. To stay safe as well as to save cost, ACM and IBM decides
to build the outermost fence with steel and then a wooden fence and steel fence
alternately inwards. Figure 1 shows the top view of such a fence layout. The
grey lines indicate that steel fence will be built by IBM along those lines.
The brown dashed lines indicate that wooden fences will be built along those
lines. Given a fence layout, you will have to help ACM and IBM to find out the
total cost for building fences by writing a program. Your solution must be
quite efficient. </p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-style:normal'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>The input file
contains at most 12 sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'>The first line
of each set is an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;501) which denotes how many fences are
to be built. Each of the next N lines describes a fence ring. Each fence ring
is described as a complete convex polygon. The description starts with an
integer M (0&lt;M&lt;1001) which denotes the total number of wall segments that
make up the fence ring. This M is followed by M pairs of floating-point numbers
(x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>), (x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>2</span></sub>), (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>,
y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>)<span class=GramE>,

,</span> (<span class=SpellE>x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M</span></sub></span>,
<span class=SpellE>y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M</span></sub></span>).
These integers denote that the fence is made by connecting the points (x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>1</span></sub>) with (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>,
y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>), (x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>2</span></sub>) with (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>,
y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>), <span
class=GramE>
 ,</span> (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M-1</span></sub>,
y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M-1</span></sub>) with <a
name="OLE_LINK2"></a><a name="OLE_LINK1"><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'>(</span></a><span
class=SpellE><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><span style='mso-bookmark:
OLE_LINK2'>x</span></span><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><span
style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'><sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M</span></sub></span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK1'><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'>, <span
class=SpellE>y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M</span></sub></span>)</span></span>
and (<span class=SpellE>x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M</span></sub></span>,
<span class=SpellE>y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>M</span></sub></span>)
with (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>). You can assume that the
fence layout will be a valid one  (a) two fence rings will not intersect (b)
fence rings will always be described as a convex polygon. You <span
class=SpellE>cam</span> also assume that absolute value of all the coordinates
will be less than 400000.<br>
Input is terminated by a line containing a single zero.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:14.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each line of input produce 5 lines of output. <br>
The first line contains the serial of output. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The next line reports the total number of communities. A
community is comprised by people who share a common outermost boundary. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The third line contains the string <span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>Total Cost:</span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>The fourth and
fifth line reports the total cost to build the steel fence and wooden fence
respectively. The cost has to be reported million Yuan rounded to the eight
digits after the decimal. Assume that the cost of building steel fence is 100
Yuan/unit length and that for Wooden fence is 50 Yuan/unit length. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Print a blank
line after output for each set of input. Look at the output for sample input
for details. Output difference due to small precision error will be ignored.</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif";font-style:normal'>Sample
Input <o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:white;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=616 valign=top style='width:462.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>8 112 134 73 141
  41 119 32 82 54 50 92 43 124 65 132 103<br>
  6 119 <span class=SpellE>119</span> 102 119 94 101 102 83 119 83 127 101<br>
  8 83 106 62 111 45 99 42 78 54 59 75 55 92 66 96 87<br>
  6 70 97 56 97 49 85 56 73 70 73 77 85<br>
  8 143 222 110 244 61 238 35 209 39 169 72 147 121 153 147 181<br>
  4 115 226 58 226 51 167 132 167<br>
  4 113 212 65 212 65 172 113 172<br>
  5 99 205 83 206 71 187 91 179 105 189<br>
  2<br>
  4 0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> 100 0 100 <span class=SpellE>100</span> 0 100<br>
  4 1000 <span class=SpellE>1000</span> 1100 1000 1100 <span class=SpellE>1100</span>
  1000 1100<br>
  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
.MsoChpDefault
	{mso-style-type:export-only;
	mso-default-props:yes;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Calibri;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Calibri;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Vrinda;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:57.6pt 57.6pt 67.7pt 57.6pt;
	mso-header-margin:36.0pt;
	mso-footer-margin:36.0pt;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050"/>

 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:36.0pt'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:55.7pt'>
  <td width=104 style='width:78.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid black .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>I</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=428 style='width:321.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:
  none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><b><span style='font-size:26.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:20.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Brother Arif,
  please feed us!</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:32.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=122 style='width:91.8pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;height:55.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:81pt;
   height:79.5pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=108 height=106
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="PBrush" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1325021963">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>Brother Arif
is a great <span class=SpellE>problemsetter</span>. He loves grid. Also, he
loves light. That's why the other <span class=SpellE>problemsetters</span>
believe that asking him to throw a feast is always right. Unfortunately Brother
Arif himself doesn't think so. Instead of all the naggings and reasons going on
around him, he stays in his chair with dreamy eyes and lovingly thinks about
newer ways of placing lights inside a 2D grid. Now, it's time to make your
stand for the deprived <span class=SpellE>problemsetters</span>' right and
force Brother Arif to their pleas.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>Now, the <span
class=SpellE>problemsetters</span> have all gathered inside a room. The floor
of this room is shaped like a 2d Rectangular grid consisting of many cells. Any
of the <span class=SpellE>problemsetters</span> can stand on a cell. A cell has
enough <span class=GramE>place</span> for only one people and everyone must
occupy exactly one cell at a time. Brother Arif, standing on one of these
cells, can move to one of the four adjacent cells just once or he may not move
at all. He may not leave the grid, however. The other <span class=SpellE>problemsetters</span>
are <span class=GramE>standing<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>on</span>
other cells. With the help of their new <span class=SpellE>telecatching</span>
device, they can capture anyone standing at the same row or column irrespective
to his distance. So, now you are given the positions of the <span class=SpellE>problemsetters</span>
and are asked to figure out if Brother Arif can escape from getting captured
(and thus throwing a huge party.)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><b>Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>The input file
has multiple test cases. Each test case begins with 3 integers, <b>R
(1&lt;=R&lt;=10000), C (1&lt;=C&lt;=10000) &amp; N (1&lt;=N&lt;=2000)</b>. <b>R
</b>&amp;<b>C </b>are the number of rows &amp; columns in the grid while <b>N </b>denotes
the number of <span class=SpellE>problemsetters</span> present on the room. <b>N
+ 1 </b>lines follow the first line. Each of the next <b>N </b>lines has 2
integers, <b>r (0 &lt;= r &lt; R) &amp; c (0 &lt;= c &lt; C<span class=GramE>)
,</span></b> position of a <span class=SpellE>problemsetter</span>. For your
reference, the upper left corner of the cell has <b>(0<span class=GramE>,0</span>)</b>
while the lower left one has (<b>R-1, 0) </b>and the lower right one has <b>(R-1,
C-1) </b>co-ordinate. The last line gives the co-ordinate of Brother Arif in
the same format. The last test case will be followed by a case with <b>R = C =
N = 0</b>. This case should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><b>Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>For each test
case, print a line. This line starts like, Case X: , where, <b>X </b>is the
case number. After that print a string based on Brother <span class=SpellE>Arif's</span>
destiny. If Brother Arif can find a cell where none else can catch him, print <b>Escaped
again! More 2D grid problems!<span class=GramE>.</span> </b>If someone can
capture him no matter in which cell he goes, print <b>Party time! Let's find a
restaurant!<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=665
 style='width:499.0pt;margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:
 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=189 valign=top style='width:5.0cm;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=476 valign=top style='width:357.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=189 valign=top style='width:5.0cm;border-top:none;border-left:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 <span
  class=SpellE>5</span> 2<br>
  0 1<br>
  4 2<br>
  1 2<br>
  5 <span class=SpellE>5</span> 3<br>
  0 1<br>
  4 2<br>
  4 3<br>
  1 2<br>
  0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span></span><span
  style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=476 valign=top style='width:357.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: Escaped again! More 2D grid
  problems!<br>
  Case 2: Party time! Let's find a restaurant!<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'>Problem
Setter: Mohammad <span class=SpellE>Mahmudur</span> <span class=SpellE>Rahman</span>,
Special Thanks: Sohel Hafiz</p>

	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
 /* Page Definitions */
@page
	{mso-footnote-separator:url("./a_files/header.htm") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("./a_files/header.htm") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("./a_files/header.htm") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("./a_files/header.htm") ecs;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;
	mso-footnote-numbering-restart:each-page;
	mso-endnote-numbering-style:arabic;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.5in .7in .5in .7in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-title-page:yes;
	mso-header:url("./a_files/header.htm") h1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
@list l0
	{mso-list-id:1981299557;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:-237464538 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693;}

	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3073"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Rockwell;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Super
  Heronian Triangle<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=99 valign=top style='width:74.5pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./a_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./a_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>A Heronian Triangle has sides with integer length and integer
area. For this problem, a Heronian Triangle whose radius of circum-circle is
also integer is called Super Heronian Triangle (SHT). Given the radius of
Circum Circle and area of an SHT, you will have to find such a triangle all
whose side lengths are less than 40001.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>The input file contains at most 300 lines of inputs. Each
line contains two integers R (0 &lt; R &lt; 500000) and A (0 &lt; A &lt;
700000000). Here R and A denotes the radius of circum circle and Area of an unknown
SHT. Input is terminated by a line containing two zeroes which obviously should
not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText3 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line input produce
one or more line of output. If there is no SHT with the given radius and area
and all side with lengths less than 40001, print three -1 (Minus 1) separated
by single space. Other wise print the length of sides of the SHT in ascending
order. If there is more than one such triangle print the one whose smallest
side has minimum length.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                     </span><span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">         </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5 24<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5 23<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0
  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6
  8 10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>-1
  -1 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

	{mso-list-id:1981299557;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:-237464538 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693;}

	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;

	mso-level-tab-stop:none;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;
	font-family:Symbol;}
ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3073"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Race
  to 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./b_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./b_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Dilu have learned a new thing
about integers, which is - any positive integer greater than 1 can be divided by
at least one prime number less than or equal to that number. So, he is now
playing with this property. He selects a number <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b>. And he calls this <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>In each turn he randomly chooses a
prime number less than or equal to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b>.
If <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b> is divisible by the prime number
then he divides <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b> by the prime
number to obtain new <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b>. Otherwise he
keeps the old <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b>. He repeats this
procedure until <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>D</b> becomes 1. What is
the expected number of moves required for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>
to become 1.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>[We say that an integer is said to
be prime if its divisible by exactly two different integers. So, 1 is not a
prime, by definition. List of first few primes are 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 
]<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style="mso-spacerun:
yes"> </span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>Input will start with an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T (T &lt;= 1000)</b>, which indicates the number of test cases. Each of
the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b> lines will contain one
integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N (1 &lt;= N &lt;= 1000000)</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>For each test case output a single line giving the case
number followed by the expected number of turn required. Errors up to 1e-6 will
be accepted.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span

  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

	{mso-footnote-separator:url("./c_files/header.htm") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("./c_files/header.htm") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("./c_files/header.htm") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("./c_files/header.htm") ecs;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;
	mso-footnote-numbering-restart:each-page;
	mso-endnote-numbering-style:arabic;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.5in .7in .5in .7in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-title-page:yes;
	mso-header:url("./c_files/header.htm") h1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
@list l0
	{mso-list-id:1981299557;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:-237464538 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693;}

	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3073"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
  EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>C<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Hats
  Off<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./c_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Its the Wild West. But things are
not quite well here, now. Last few months, many trains have been robbed by the mysterious
and vicious bandit called El Diablo. The railroad company has offered a
reward of about <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>$150000</b> for the one
who can stop him. Thats why John Cooper is trying to catch him.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>But the task is not that easy as it looks. Thats why John
made a team and planned to chase after the El Diablo. After a lot of hard
work and with mild plans, they finally managed to surround him in a room. But
the problem is that the only door of the room is locked and it cant be
unlocked other than finding a combination.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>There are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>
stones scattered outside the room. Each of them is equal in size but labeled by
an integer number. The door has <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>
holes numbered from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> to <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>. Any hole can contain at most one
stone. In the upper side of the door, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>m</b>
pairs of integers are written. Each of them denotes a range of some consecutive
holes.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>John is trying to arrange the stones in the holes such
that, the maximum difference of the maximum labeled stone and the minimum
labeled stone in any range is minimized. If John can place them in the best
possible way, then the door will be unlocked.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>El Diablo will escape if it takes more than <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>5</b> hours. Cause he is digging a hole
which leads to a cave. If he reaches the cave, all the plans and hark works
will be in vain, because he can escape through the cave. Thats why John is
seeking your help. Since John is not a programmer, he asks you to write a
program which will solve this problem and unlock the door. So, Hats off to you
for helping John. May be you will get a share of the reward if you can unlock
the door.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>First line of the input will contain the number of cases <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T (&lt;=300)</b>. Then <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T</b> cases follow.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>Each case will start with an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>n ( 1 &lt;= n &lt;= 30 )</b>. The next line will contain <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> integers denoting the labels of the
stones. The next line will contain an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>m ( 1 &lt;= m &lt;= 5 )</b>. Each of the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>m</b> lines will contain two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>a b ( 1 &lt;= a &lt;= b &lt;= n )</b> denoting all the holes from <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a</b> to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>b</b> (inclusive). Each of the integers will be fit into a <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>32</b> bit signed integer.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoHeader style='tab-stops:.5in center 3.0in right 6.0in'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>For each case, print the case number and the desired
result as shown below.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
