  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:center;
  tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Jumping
  Mario<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./d_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./d_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_s1044"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;
 margin-left:0;margin-top:3.55pt;width:221.95pt;height:125.25pt;z-index:1;
 mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./d_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" anchorx="page"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=296 height=167
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./d_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1044"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Mario is
in the final castle. He now needs to jump over few walls and then enter the
Koopas Chamber where he has to defeat the monster in order to save the
princess. For this problem, we are only concerned with the jumping over the
wall part. You will be given the heights of <b>N</b> walls from left to right.
Mario is currently standing on the first wall. He has to jump to the adjacent
walls one after another until he reaches the last one. That means, he will make
(<b>N-1</b>) jumps. A <i>high jump</i> is one where Mario has to jump to a
taller wall, and similarly, a low jump is one where Mario has to jump to a
shorter wall. Can you find out the total number of <i>high jumps</i> and <i>low
jumps</i> Mario has to make?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>The first line of input is an
integer <b>T </b>(<b>T </b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&lt; 30</b>) that
indicates the number of test cases. Each case starts with an integer <b>N </b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 &lt; <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>N </span>&lt; 50</b>) that determines the number of walls. The next line
gives the height of the <b>N</b> walls from left to right. Each height is a
positive integer not exceeding 10.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-weight:
normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText3 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>For each case, output the case number followed by 2 integers, total
high jumps and total low jumps, respectively. Look at the sample for exact
format.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 4 2 2 3 5 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>9<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 4 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 4 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 3: 4 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

  Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;

  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Component
  Placement<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>In circuit
design, component placement is an important step in the design automation.
Inferior placements may affect the performance and manufacturing cost.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>You are given a PCB (Printed
Circuit Board). It's a large green board. You can place components on either
side of the PCB. However, cost of placing a component on both sides are not the
same. You are given <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b>
components. For each component <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>c<sub>i</sub></span></b>,
cost of placing it on the top layer is <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>X<sub>i</sub></span></b> and on the bottom layer is <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Y<sub>i</sub></span></b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>These components may interact
with each other. If both the components are on the same side of the PCB, the
interconnection cost is negligible. But, if they are on different sides, their
interconnection is costly. For each such interconnection <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>j</span></b>, the cost will be <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Z<sub>j</sub></span></b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Finally, some design issues restricts
some components to be on the top side or bottom side. Now, find the minimum
cost to place the components.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoHeader style='tab-stops:.5in center 3.0in right 6.0in'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>First line contains a positive
integer <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>T (T&lt;= 50)</span></b>
that denotes the number of test cases.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Each test case starts with 2
integers <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N (1 &lt;= N &lt;= 200)</span></b>
and <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>M (0 &lt;= M &lt;= 100000,<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>M &lt;= N * (N-1) / 2)</span></b>, the
number of components and number of interconnections. This will be followed by <b><i>N</i></b>
integers in a line, each between 1 and 10000000 (inclusive), where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>i</span></b>-th
of it describes the cost of placing the component on the top layer. The next
line contains <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b> more
integers, each between 1 and 10000000 (inclusive), where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>i</span></b>-th of it denotes
the cost of placing it on the bottom layer. The next line contains <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b> more integers, each will be
either 0, -1 or +1, where<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>-1 means <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>i</span></b>-th component can only be placed
on the bottom<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>+1 means <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>i</span></b>-th component can only be placed
on the top<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>0 means the component can be placed on either side<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=NoSpacing><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Then there will be <b>M</b></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'> lines,
each containing three integers, <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>p</span></b>,
<b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>q</span></b>, and <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>r (1 &lt;= p, q &lt;= N, 1 &lt;= r &lt;=
10000000)</span></b>, denoting that, <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>p</span></b>
and <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>q-</span></b>th component has
to be interconnected and if they are on different layers, the cost of
interconnection will be <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>r<i>.</i></span></b>
There will be at most one interconnection between any pair or components.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>For each test case, output the minimum cost to place the
components.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

	mso-font-signature:-1 -369098753 63 0 4129023 0;}

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4097"/>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Rockwell;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Racing
  Car Computer<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./f_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./f_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>The racing cars of today are
equipped with so many sophisticated equipment. Introduction of a new visual
transducer which is interfaced with the on-board computer can tell you on the
fly how many cars are ahead of you while how many are trailing. There are <b>N </b>cars
on a racing track. Each has an on-board computer with the new feature. During
the race, every single car's computer keeps displaying two integers, <b>a </b>(The
number of cars in front of him) &amp; <b>b </b>(The number of cars behind him)
for a particular moment. It is possible that at some time, some of the cars are
racing side by side i.e. they are exactly at the same location. A car will not
consider any other car at the same location to be a leading or trailing car. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3 style='line-height:11.0pt'>Now, it is suspected that some
of the new transducers are not working properly inside such high speed
vehicles. The report with all computers' data generated at a particular
timestamp is reported to you. You are to determine the minimum number of cars
that<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>have faulty data.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Each test case begins with an
integer <b>N (1&lt;=N&lt;=1000), </b>the number of cars on a track<b> </b>. The
next N lines each has two integers - <b>a </b>&amp; <b>b (0&lt;=a,b&lt;=1500) </b>for
a particular car.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>The last test case is followed by
a line with a single 0 indicating the end of input.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>          </span></span><span
style='mso-tab-count:12'>                                                                                                                                                </span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>For each test case, print a line
in the format, <b>Case X: Y</b>, where <b>X</b> is the case number &amp; <b>Y</b>
is the minimum number of cars that must have faulty data according to the
report.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=638 bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:6.65in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>0 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<title>World Finals 2010 Warmup - Problem G</title>

  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>World
  of Knots<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b

  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:NimbusRomNo9L-Regu;color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>Today, we will be unraveling the mysteries
of one of the most twisted and curly beasts in all existence  knots! The
problem here is simple: given the picture of a string laid out curled on a
table, you are to determine if it will curl up into a knot when the ends are
pulled out.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shape id="_x0000_s1046"
  type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;left:0;text-align:left;
  margin-left:171pt;margin-top:0;width:140.85pt;height:153pt;z-index:1;
  mso-position-horizontal:absolute;mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;
  mso-position-vertical:absolute;mso-position-vertical-relative:text'>
  <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom" anchorx="page"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 align=left>
  <tr>
   <td width=228 height=0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=188 height=204 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1046"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
<span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<br style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>The input will consist of a diagram of
one single continuous string described in a two dimensional grid of characters
such as shown above. The '-' and '</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>|</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>' characters
represent a horizontal and vertical segment of the string, respectively. '</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>+</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>' characters represent corners where the string turns at
right angles on the table. '</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'>I</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>' or '</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>H</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>' characters represent locations where parts of the strings
cross:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:OpenSymbol;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;mso-fareast-font-family:OpenSymbol;color:windowtext'>
</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'>'</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'>H</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>' represents locations where the
horizontal string passes <i>over </i>the vertical string<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.25in;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:OpenSymbol;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'></span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;mso-fareast-font-family:OpenSymbol;color:windowtext'>
</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'>'</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'>I</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>' represents locations where the
horizontal string passes <i>under </i>the vertical string<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>The dot character, '</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>', obviously, represents empty spaces of the table unoccupied
by the string. Two horizontally adjacent nonempty spaces of the table are
connected by the string iff neither of them are '</span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>|</span><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>'
characters. Similarly, vertically adjacent nonempty spaces are connected by the
string iff neither of them are '-' characters. Inputs will be such that every '</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>+</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>' character will represent a proper corner where the string
turns at a unambiguously at a right angle: formally, every '</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>+</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>' character will be connected to exactly one vertically
adjacent and exactly one horizontally adjacent space.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>Moreover, to further simplify matters,
you can assume that the only characters along the border of the given diagram,
other than dots, will represent endpoints of the string. In short, the input
will unambiguously specify a valid piece of string starting and ending at the
border of the input diagram. </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Verdana'>Finally, assume that the string has negligible width and is made of a
very smooth material, so that parts of the string can easily slide over each
other with negligible friction.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h2>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>The input will consist of at most 80 test
cases. Each test case will start with a single line containing two integers, <i>r
</i>and <i>c</i>, indicating that the size of the diagram for that case is of <i>r
</i>rows and <i>c </i>columns. This line will be followed by <i>r </i>more
lines, each with exactly <i>c </i>characters, with characters in each line
representing a row of the diagram. You may assume that 2 &#8804; <i>r</i>,<i>c </i>&#8804;
120. Input is terminated by a line containing two zeroes. This line should not
be processed.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>The output should consist of exactly one
line for each test case in the format<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'><span style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>Case <i>c</i>: <i>Response</i></span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>where <i>c </i>is the test case serial
number, starting from 1, and <i>Response </i>is either the string </span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>straightened</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'> or </span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'>knotted</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'> (without the quotes) depending
on whether the string will straighten out or coil up into a knot, respectively.
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;color:windowtext'>See the sample for further
clarifications.</span><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

 /* Page Definitions */
@page
	{mso-footnote-separator:url("./h_files/header.htm") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("./h_files/header.htm") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("./h_files/header.htm") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("./h_files/header.htm") ecs;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;
	mso-footnote-numbering-restart:each-page;
	mso-endnote-numbering-style:arabic;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.5in .7in .5in .7in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-title-page:yes;
	mso-header:url("./h_files/header.htm") h1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4097"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Lattice
  Point or Not<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./h_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./h_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3><a name=mhvd></a>Now a days a very common problem is:
The coordinate of two points in Cartesian coordinate system is (200, 300) and
(4000, 5000). If these two points are connected we get a line segment. How many
lattice points are there on this line segment. You will have to do a similar
task in this problem  the only difference is that the terminal coordinates can
be fractions.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>First line of the input file contains a positive integer N
(N&lt;=50000) that denotes how many lines of inputs follow. This line is
followed by N lines each of which contains four floating-point numbers x1, y1,
x2, y2 (0&lt; |x<sub>1</sub>|, |y<sub>1</sub>|, |x<sub>2</sub>|, |y<sub>2</sub>|
&lt;=200000). These floating-point numbers has exactly one digit after the
decimal point. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText3 style='tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line of input except
the first line produce one line of output. This line contains an integer which
denotes how many lattice points are there on the line segment that connects the
two points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=638 bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:6.65in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='height:45.85pt'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:45.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10.1 10.1 11.2 11.2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10.2 100.3 300.3 11.1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1.0 1.0 2.0 2.0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:45.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3073"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>All
  Souls Night<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1040" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./i_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1040"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:center;
mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Standing
on the bridge that crosses the river that goes out to the sea<br>
The wind is full of a thousand voices, they pass by the bridge and me<br>
I can see the lights in the distance trembling in the dark cloak of night<br>
Candles and lanterns are dancing, dancing a waltz on all souls night.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>In the
traditional all souls night celebration, souls of the departed are commemorated
by sending candle-lit lanterns on out waterways leading to the oceans,<span
style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>sometimes in little boats. A single lantern
represents an individual soul drifting away to the next world. Let's assume the
position of a lantern just at the moment of entering the next world is given by
the coordinates of a single point in 3-d space. A pair of souls can communicate
with each other by straight-lined light rays joining themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>As soon as the souls enter
afterlife, they are covered by a mysterious veil which separates themselves
from the distant living world. The veil should be placed in such a way that the
communication beams between any two souls are entirely contained within the
veil in order to prevent the living world people overhearing them. Now, as the
weavers of heaven are tired of going on knitting veils for an eternity, they
ask for your help. You are asked to calculate the minimum surface area of the
veil required to cover a group of souls fulfilling the restrictions given
above. Help Heaven!<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>The
input file will contain multiple test cases. Each case begins with an integer <b>N
(3 &lt; N &lt; 26)</b>, the number of souls in a group. Each of the following <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> lines contains 3 integers giving the <b>x</b>,
<b>y</b> and <b>z </b>coordinates of a single soul (<b>-100 &lt;= x, y, z &lt;=
100)</b>.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>They will be positioned in
such a way that there won't be more than 3 souls in any polygonal face of the
veil. The end of input will be marked by a case with <b>N = 0</b>. This case
should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>For each
test case, print a line in the format, </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case X: Y</span></b><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>, where
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>X</b> is the case number &amp; <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Y</b> is the minimum required surface area of
the veil. Print 2 digits after the decimal point for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Y</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                                
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=331 valign=top style='width:3.45in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 4 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=343 valign=top style='width:257.05pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 37.86<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.NoSpacing, li.NoSpacing, div.NoSpacing
	{mso-style-name:"No Spacing";
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
 /* Page Definitions */
@page
	{mso-footnote-separator:url("./j_files/header.htm") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("./j_files/header.htm") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("./j_files/header.htm") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("./j_files/header.htm") ecs;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;
	mso-footnote-numbering-restart:each-page;
	mso-endnote-numbering-style:arabic;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.5in .7in .5in .7in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-title-page:yes;
	mso-header:url("./j_files/header.htm") h1;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
@list l0
	{mso-list-id:1981299557;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:-237464538 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693;}
@list l0:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;
	mso-level-tab-stop:none;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;
	font-family:Symbol;}
ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3073"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>J<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Lighting
  Away<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=101 valign=top style='width:75.4pt;border:solid windowtext .25pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1042" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./j_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/./j_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1042"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'>Ronju is a night-guard at the
Lavish office buildings Ltd. headquarters. The office has a large grass field
in front of the building. So every day, when Ronju comes to duty at the
evening, it is his duty to turn on all the lights in the field. However, given
the large size of the field and the large number of lights, it is very tiring
for him to walk to each and every individual light to turn it on.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText3>So he has devised an ingenious plan  he will swap the
switches for light-sensitive triggers. A local electronic store nearby sells
these funny trigger switches at a very cheap price. Once installed at a
light-post, it will automatically turn that light on whenever it can sense some
other light lighting up nearby. So from now on, Ronju can just manually flip a
few switches, and the light from those will trigger nearby sensors, which will
in turn light up some more lights nearby, and so on, gradually lighting up the
whole field.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>Now Ronju wonders: how many switches does he have to flip
manually for this?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>The input starts with an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T</b>, the number of test cases to follow. Each test case will start
with two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &lt;= <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>N</span> &lt;= 10000</b>) and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M </b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 &lt;= <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>M</span> &lt;= 100000</b>), where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>
is the number of lights in the field, and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b>
more lines of input follows in this input case. Each of these extra <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> lines will have two integers <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>b</b> separated by a space, where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1
&lt;= a, b &lt;= N</b>, indicating that if the light <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>a</b> lights up, it will trigger the light <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>b</b> to turn on as well (according to their distance, brightness,
sensor sensitivity, orientation and other complicated factors). Finally, every
test case in the input will be followed by a blank line.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-tab-count:9'>                                                                                                            </span></p>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana'>For each input test case, the output must be a single line
of the format </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
k: c</span></b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'> where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>k</b> is the case number starting with 1,
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>c</b> is the minimum number of
lights that Ronju must turn on manually before all the lights in the whole
field gets lit up.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:121.5pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<style>

	{mso-style-parent:"Body Text";

	mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
	mso-font-kerning:.5pt;}
p.MsoBodyText, li.MsoBodyText, div.MsoBodyText
	{margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:6.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:none;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
