 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:1.15pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .1pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .1pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:1.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=274 valign=top style='width:205.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .1pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .1pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .1pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:1.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  10.0pt'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:256.4pt;height:170.65pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:7.2pt;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-wrap-distance-bottom:7.2pt;mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=342 height=228
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/d_files/image001.jpg"  align=left hspace=5 style='margin-left:5px;
margin-right:-5px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:10px' v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]>Well,
5 of the trouble makers are going to Dinajpur by the well known train Drutojan
Express. The 5 trouble makers  <i>Ja, Sam, Sha, Sid</i> and <i>Tan </i>were
discussing about how to create trouble in Dinajpur. But after a while they
themselves got into trouble. Well, let me share the story with you.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt'>The tickets
they bought were the cause of the problem. See, 4 of those tickets all shared
the same compartment while the other ticket was for a different compartment. As
you can guess, no one was willing to go to the compartment where the single
seat is.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt'>After almost
two hours of quarrel and unmentionable fights, they were exhausted; so they
came up with a plan. The plan is: each of them will make a list containing
names of the other persons. Now, if a person goes to the single seat, first he
will stay there for <b><i>M</i></b> minutes. After that he will exchange his
seat with the person who is on top of his own list. At this point he will also
update his list by removing this name from top of his list and add the name at
the bottom of the list.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt'>This will go
on all through their journey. So you are given their lists, the person who is
on the single seat right now and the total time <b><i>N</i></b> (in minutes)
for which they would be traveling. For each of them, you have to find the total
time he will stay in the single seat. You can assume that its takes 2 minutes
to exchange seats. And you will start time counting from the 0<sup>th</sup>
minute. That means if <b><i>M</i></b> is 5 and the first person who is in the
single is <i>Sid</i>, then he will exchange after 5 minutes. Then from the 7<sup>th</sup>
minute the next person in his list (<i>Sha</i>) will be in that seat. Remember
that a person can leave the seat without staying <b><i>M</i></b> minutes if the
train reaches the destination within <b><i>M</i></b>.</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:21.75pt'>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt;tab-stops:
24.0pt'>The first line of the input will contain an integer <b><i>T </i>(</b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>
500)</b> denoting the number of cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt;tab-stops:
24.0pt'>Each case starts with two integers <b><i>M</i> (2</b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>M</i></b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>30)</b>
and <b><i>N</i>(10</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>N</i></b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>1000)</b>
and the name of the person who is in the single seat. Then there will be 5
lines. Each of the lines represents a list. A list contains and integer <b><i>k</i>
(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>k</i></b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>20)</b>
and <b><i>k</i></b> names separated by spaces. That means this list has <b><i>k</i></b>
members and the names are listed from top to bottom. These 5 lines contain
lists of <i>Ja, Sam, Sha, Sid </i>and <i>Tan </i>respectively. In a list, a
name can occur more than once. You can assume no one will put his own name in
his list.</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:21.75pt'>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:21.75pt'>For each case
print the the case number in a single line. Then print 5 lines for each person
(in the order shown below) and total time he will be on the single seat. Check
samples for details. Report the names as in input.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:240.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .1pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .1pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .1pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='text-align:justify'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:241.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .1pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='text-align:justify'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:240.9pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .1pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .1pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>3
  11 Ja<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>5
  Tan Sid Sam Sha Tan<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>1
  Ja<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>1
  Ja<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>1
  Ja<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>1
  Ja<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:241.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .1pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .1pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .1pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>Case
  1:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>Ja
  4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'>Sam
  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";

  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";

  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";

  3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier 10 Pitch"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>Explanation<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>First 3 minutes Ja was on the
single seat<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>After that he exchanged his
seat with Tan, it took 2 minutes<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>After that Tan was there for 3
minutes.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>He exchanged with Ja again,
and it took 2 minutes<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>Ja stayed for 1 minute and
they reached the destination. So, Ja was there for 4 minutes and Tan was there
for 3 minutes.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;page-break-before:always'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

</div>

</body>

	{mso-style-name:Index;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Liberation Serif";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
	mso-bidi-font-family:Vrinda;
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;}
p.TableContents, li.TableContents, div.TableContents
	{mso-style-name:"Table Contents";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Liberation Serif";

	mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";

	{mso-style-name:SampleIO;

	{mso-style-name:Constraints;
	mso-style-parent:"Body Text";
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:6.0pt;
	margin-left:16.55pt;
	mso-pagination:none;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Liberation Serif";

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:35.45pt;line-break:strict'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.6pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:59.05pt'>
  <td width=90 rowspan=3 style='width:67.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#B3B3B3;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=575 colspan=2 style='width:431.1pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt'>Colorful Board 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;height:18.55pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=296 valign=top style='width:222.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:.7pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:.7pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=296 valign=top style='width:222.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:.7pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:1.4pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:1.4pt;
margin-left:17.25pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:11.65pt;mso-line-height-alt:
5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600"
 o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f"
 stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:169.85pt;height:184.75pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:7.2pt;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=226 height=246
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/e_files/image001.jpg"  align=left hspace=5 style='margin-left:5px;
margin-right:-5px;margin-left:5px;margin-right:-5px' v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>You
are given a rectangular board. You are asked to draw <b><i>M</i></b> horizontal
lines and <b><i>N</i></b> vertical lines in that board, so that the whole board
will be divided into (<b><i>M</i>+1</b>) × (<b><i>N</i>+1</b>) cells. So there
will be <b><i>M</i> + 1</b> rows each of which will exactly contain <b><i>N</i>
+ 1</b> cells or columns. The <i>y</i><sup>th</sup> cell of <i>x</i><sup>th</sup>
row can be called as cell(<i>x</i>, <i>y</i>). The distance between two
different cells is the summation of row difference and column difference of
those two cells. So the distance between cell(<i>x</i><sub>1</sub>, <i>y</i><sub>1</sub>)
and cell(<i>x</i><sub>2</sub>, <i>y</i><sub>2</sub>) is |<i>x</i><sub>1</sub> 
<i>x</i><sub>2</sub>| + |<i>y</i><sub>1</sub>  <i>y</i><sub>2</sub>|. For
example, the distance between cell(2, 3) and cell(3, 2) is |2  3| + |3  2| =
1 + 1 = 2.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:1.4pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:1.4pt;
margin-left:17.25pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:11.65pt;mso-line-height-alt:
5.0pt'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>After that you have to color every cells of the board. For
that you are given <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i>K</i></b>
different colors. To make the board more beautiful you have to make sure that
no two adjacent cells contain the same color, in other word no two cells having
the same color can have the distance 1 in between them. To make the board even
more beautiful you have to make sure no two cells having the same color can
have the odd distance between them. So if you color cell(3, 5) with red, you cannot
color cell(5, 8) with red, as the distance between them is 5, which is odd.
Note that you can keep some color unused, but you cant keep some cell
uncolored.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:1.4pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:1.4pt;
margin-left:16.55pt;text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:5.0pt'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input
will start with an integer <b><i>T (T &#8804; 50000) </i></b>which indicates
the number of test cases. Each of the next <b><i>T</i></b> lines will contain
three space separated integers <b><i>M</i> (0 &#8804; <i>M</i> &#8804; 19)</b>,
<b><i>N </i>(0 &#8804; <i>N</i> &#8804; 19)</b> and <b>K (1 &#8804; <i>K</i> &#8804;
50)</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:1.4pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:1.4pt;
margin-left:16.55pt;text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>For each test case,
output a single line in the form </span><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Case
</span></b><b><i><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>#</span></i></b><b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>: </span></b><b><i><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>P</span></i></b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>,
where # will be replaced by the case number and <b><i>P</i></b> will be replaced
by the number of valid ways you can draw the given board. The result can be
very large you should output the result <b>modulo 1000000007</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.4pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.4pt;page-break-before:always'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:1.4pt;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  1.4pt;margin-left:17.5pt;mso-line-height-alt:5.0pt'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4<br>
  0 0 1<br>
  0 0 2<br>
  5 5 2<br>
  5 5 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:1.4pt;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  1.4pt;margin-left:17.5pt;mso-line-height-alt:5.0pt'><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: 1<br>
  Case 2: 2<br>
  Case 3: 2<br>
  Case 4: 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=SampleIO style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  0in;margin-left:17.5pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:Vrinda;
	panose-1:1 1 6 0 1 1 1 1 1 1;
	mso-font-charset:0;
	mso-generic-font-family:auto;
	mso-font-pitch:variable;
	mso-font-signature:65539 0 0 0 1 0;}

line-break:strict'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:96.25pt;height:131.55pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/f_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=128 height=175
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/117/f_files/image001.jpg"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]>It is
that time of the year again! Colorful balloons and brightly colored banners spread
out over your entire neighborhood for just this one occasion. It is the annual
clown's festival at your local school. For the first time in their lives,
students from the school try their hands at being the best clown ever. Some
walk on long poles, others try to keep a crowd laughing for the day with stage
comedy, while others still try out their first juggling act - some 'master
clowns' even teach these juggling tricks to<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>visitors at the festival. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'>As part of the festival, there
is a unique event known as the &quot;Horror Dash&quot;. At this event, <b><i>N</i>
(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>N</i></b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>100)</b>
students dressed in the scariest costumes possible start out in a race to catch
a poor clown running on the same track. The clown trips over, loses his mind,
and does all sorts of comical acts all while being chased round and round on
the track. To keep the event running for as long as possible, the clown must
run fast enough not to be caught by any of the scary creatures. However, to
keep the audience on the edge of their seats, the clown must not run too fast
either. This is where you are to help. Given the speed of every scary creature,
you are to find out the minimum speed that the clown must maintain so as not to
get caught even if they keep on running forever.</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Input</h2>

<p class=Constraints>The first line of input contains a single integer <b><i>T</i>
(<i>T</i></b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>50)</b>, the number of
test cases. This line is followed by <b><i>T</i></b> input cases. Each input
case is on a single line of space-separated integers. The first of these
integers is <b><i>N</i></b>, the number of students acting as scary creatures. The
rest of the line has <b><i>N</i></b> more integers, <b><i>c</i><sub>0</sub>, <i>c</i><sub>1</sub>,
..., <i>c<sub>n</sub></i></b>, each representing the speed of a creature in
meters per second <b>(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>c<sub>i</sub></i></b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>10000
for each <i>i</i>)</b>. You can assume that they are always running in the same
direction on the track.</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.55pt'>There should be a single line
of output for each test case, formatted as <span style='font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'></span><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>Case c: s</span><span style='font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'></span>. Here, <b><i>c</i></b>
represents the serial number of the input case, starting with 1, while <b><i>s</i></b>
represents the required speed of the clown, in meters per second. </p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO>2 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO>5 9 3 5 2 6 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO>1 2</p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 1: 9</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 2: 2</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:1.1in;
	text-indent:-1.1in;}
ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.0pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:59.05pt'>
  <td width=90 rowspan=3 style='width:67.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#B3B3B3;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-size:72.0pt'>G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=552 colspan=2 style='width:414.15pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:36.0pt'>Determine the Shape<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;height:18.55pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=273 valign=top style='width:205.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  10.0pt'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:1.15pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:1.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=273 valign=top style='width:205.05pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:1.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  10.0pt'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:197.9pt;height:235.8pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:left;mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;
 mso-position-vertical-relative:text' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=264 height=314
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/g_files/image001.png"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><span
lang=EN-ZA style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'><br>
</span><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:
Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>A toy
company recently found that toys like revolver, machine guns, fighting planes
are making children violent and destroying the peace of the world. The parents
also began to avoid these toys and inclined to educational toys. So they
decided to manufacture educational toys. One of these is a electric touch pad
on which children can put four points and the program will automatically join
the points to form a closed shape. Children will try to guess the shape and
when they press a button then it will automatically announce the shape. But
they are struggling to determine the shape and seek your help.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>Your task is simple. You are given four points, no
three of them are collinear, you have to output the simple polygonal shape
formed by these points in the following order:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>Square<br>
Rectangle<br>
Rhombus<br>
<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>Parallelogram<br>
Trapezium<br>
Ordinary Quadrilateral<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>For example if it is possible to form a square with
the four points you must output </span><span lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:
EN-US'></span><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:
Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>Square</span><span
lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:EN-US'></span><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>,<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>if it is not
possible to form a square but possible to form a rectangle you must output </span><span
lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:EN-US'></span><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-ansi-language:EN-US'>Rectangle</span><span lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:
EN-US'></span><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:
Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-ansi-language:EN-US'> and
so on.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=Constraints>Input starts with an integer <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>T</span></b>, the number of test cases (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=AR-SA
style='font-family:"MS PMincho";mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>50000</b>). Each test
case contains 4 lines. Each of the lines contains two space separated integers <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>x<sub>i</sub> y<sub>i</sub> (-10000</b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=AR-SA style='font-family:"MS PMincho";
mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>x<sub>i</sub>,
y<sub>i</sub></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=AR-SA
style='font-family:"MS PMincho";mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span> 10000)</b> which are
the coordinate values of a point.</p>

<p class=Constraints><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in;page-break-before:always'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.55pt'>For each set of input output
one line in the format <span lang=AR-SA style='font-family:"DejaVu Sans";
mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case </span><i>k</i></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>: </span><i>s</i></b><span
lang=AR-SA style='font-family:"DejaVu Sans";mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'></span>.
Here <b><i>k</i></b> is the case number starting from 1 and <b><i>s</i></b> is
the shape as described above. See sample input output for more details.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=303 valign=top style='width:227.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt;layout-grid-mode:char'><b>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=338 valign=top style='width:253.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt;layout-grid-mode:char'><b>Sample
  Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=303 valign=top style='width:227.6pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO style='layout-grid-mode:char'>6</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>2 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>2 2</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 2</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>3 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>3 2</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 2</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>8 4</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>5 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>3 4</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>2 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>3 2</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>1 2</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>5 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>4 3</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>1 3</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>0 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>5 0</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>4 3</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>1 4</p>
  <p class=SampleIO><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=338 valign=top style='width:253.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO style='layout-grid-mode:char'>Case 1: Square</p>
  <p class=SampleIO style='layout-grid-mode:char'>Case 2: Rectangle</p>
  <p class=SampleIO style='layout-grid-mode:char'>Case 3: Rhombus</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 4: Parallelogram</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 5: Trapezium</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 6: Ordinary Quadrilateral</p>
  <p class=SampleIO><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.4pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.4pt'><i>Note: If you have forgotten elementary
geometry, here is the definitions to remind you:<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.4pt'><i>Square: All sides are of
equal size all angles are 90<sup>o<br>
</sup>Rectangle: Opposite sides are of equal size and all angles are 90<sup>o<br>
</sup>Rhombus: All sides are of equal size but no angle is 90<sup>o<br>
</sup>Parallelogram: Opposite sides are of equal size but no angle is 90<sup>o</sup>
<br>
Trapezium: Any two opposite sides are parallel but the other two is not.<br>
Simple Polygon: Polygon having no self intersecting edge. </i></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;

	margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	{mso-style-parent:Heading;
	mso-style-next:"Body Text";
	margin-top:12.0pt;

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:35.45pt;line-break:strict'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:59.05pt'>
  <td width=90 rowspan=3 style='width:67.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#B3B3B3;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-size:72.0pt'>H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=553 colspan=2 style='width:414.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:24.0pt'>A Problemsetter Blind with Emotion<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;height:18.55pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=274 valign=top style='width:205.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  10.0pt'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:1.15pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:1.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=274 valign=top style='width:205.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:1.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:
  10.0pt'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.45pt;text-indent:8.85pt'>Once there
was this great problemsetter whom we've heard of before. He was blind with emotion.
Let's call him Emotional Blind for now, assuming no coincidence with any real
person will occur. He was always so busy with emotions that he never had the
time to take care of all the requests and persuasions and tantrums going on
around him to throw a feast. Naturally, the people around him i.e. the
problemsetters got irritated but nothing could change his emotions about not
throwing a party. Then the great Sultan came into the scenario. The Sultan,
like so many other times when he claimed to have found an error on some little
this or that - for example data, found the error with the way the emotional
problemsetter was treating his poor fellows and got very angry.<!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:194.6pt;height:145.9pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:7.2pt;
 mso-wrap-distance-bottom:7.2pt;mso-position-horizontal:left;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;mso-position-vertical-relative:text'
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/h_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=259 height=195
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/h_files/image001.jpg"  align=left hspace=5 style='margin-left:-5px;
margin-right:5px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-bottom:10px;
margin-left:-5px;margin-right:5px;margin-top:0px' v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.45pt;text-indent:8.85pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.45pt;text-indent:8.85pt'>Now Emotional
Blind started to get scared and thought that he should prepare some long
lectures filled with different emotions to drive the other problemsetters away
whenever they come with another of those feast requests. Each lecture should
consist of <b><i>N</i> </b>topics. For each of these <b><i>N</i> </b>topics,
you are given 5 integers - <b><i>x, a, b, c </i></b>and<i> <b>d</b></i>. For a
particular topic, Emotional Blind needs to lecture each problemsetter for <b><i>x</i>
</b>minutes. While the time duration is same for every problemsetter, the
materials must be exclusive i.e. he can't use the same lecture content to more
than one problemsetter, as the problemsetters are very collaborative creatures
and<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>believe in information sharing. So,
if he needs to drive away <b><i>S</i> </b>problemsetters, he needs content of <b><i>x
* S</i> </b>minutes on that topic. He can collect contents by reading books or
wikipedia. It takes him <b><i>a</i> </b>minutes to read each book (Being the
great programmer as he is, he has written a program that helps him to read any
book in exactly <b><i>a</i> </b>minutes.) and he gets contents of length <b><i>b</i>
</b>minutes for this particular topic. On the other hand, he needs <b><i>c</i> </b>minutes
to read a single wikipedia article (with all the external links) and can gather
<b><i>d</i> </b>minutes' content from them. He may read as many books or
articles as he wishes.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.45pt;text-indent:8.85pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.45pt;text-indent:8.85pt'>Now,
Emotional Blind has a total of <b><i>M</i> </b>minutes to research. Help him to
find out the maximum number of problemsetters he can drive away.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'>Input</h2>

<p class=Constraints style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'>Input starts
with an integer <b><i>T</i></b>, the number of test cases.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'>Each test
case starts with a line with 2 integers <b><i>N</i> (1</b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>N</i></b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>1000)
</b>and <b><i>M</i> (1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>M</i></b><b><i><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></i>10000000).
<i>N</i></b> lines follow. Each of these lines contains 5 integers - <b><i>x</i>
(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>x</i></b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>1000),
<i>a</i>(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>a</i></b><b><i><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></i>100),
<i>b</i>(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>b</i></b><b><i><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>a</i>),
c(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>c</i></b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>100) </b>and<b>
<i>d</i>(1</b><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><i>d</i></b><b><i><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span>c</i>)</b>.
</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'>For each test
case, print the case number and then the maximum possible number of
problemsetters Emotional Blind can drive away. Check sample output for exact
format.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:15.5pt;text-indent:9.5pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt;layout-grid-mode:char'><b>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=311 valign=top style='width:232.95pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt;layout-grid-mode:char'><b>Sample
  Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO style='layout-grid-mode:char'>1</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>3 100</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>10 20 10 30 15</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>20 6 4 4 4</p>
  <p class=SampleIO>20 3 3 5 5</p>
  </td>
  <td width=311 valign=top style='width:232.95pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO style='layout-grid-mode:char'>Case 1: 1</p>
  <p class=SampleIO><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=296 valign=top style='width:222.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:.7pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:16.55pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:129.1pt;height:86.05pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=172 height=115
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/i_files/image001.png"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>It is very easy to find number of
trailing zero in <b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n!</i></b><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i>for a particular base <b><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>b</i></b>. In this problem you have to do
the reverse. You have to find for how many bases <b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>b</i></b>, <b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n!</i></b><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> </i><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>has <b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>k</i></b>
trailing zeros in base <b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>b</i></b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></h2>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Input</h2>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:17.25pt;text-indent:12.05pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>Input starts with a positive number <b><i>T</i></b></span><b><span
lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></b><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>10000</span></b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>, denoting the number of test cases
to follow. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:17.25pt;text-indent:12.05pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>Each test case contains two
non-negative integers, <b><i>n</i></b></span><b><span lang=AR-SA
style='mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></b><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>10<sup>15</sup></span></b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'> and <b><i>1</i></b></span><b><i><span
lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></i></b><b><i><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>k</span></i></b><b><i><span
lang=AR-SA style='mso-ascii-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></i></b><b><i><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>10<sup>15</sup></span></i></b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'> in a line. You may assume and <b><i>n/k</i>&lt;500</b>.
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Output</h2>

<p class=NoSpacing style='margin-left:16.55pt'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>For
each input output one line containing the number of different bases. Print the
solution <b>modulo 1000000007<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.4pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  0in;margin-left:16.65pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  0in;margin-left:16.65pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>10
  2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  0in;margin-left:16.65pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>10
  3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:
  0in;margin-left:16.65pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>10
  4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:

  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:-.15pt;margin-bottom:

  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;

  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:.25pt;margin-bottom:

  1: 24 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:.25pt;margin-bottom:

  2: 0 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:.25pt;margin-bottom:
  0in;margin-left:17.5pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case

  <p class=NoSpacing style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:.25pt;margin-bottom:

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:35.45pt;line-break:strict'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.6pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:59.05pt'>
  <td width=90 rowspan=3 style='width:67.6pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;background:#B3B3B3;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:72.0pt'>J<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=575 colspan=2 style='width:431.1pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:59.05pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt'>The Great Merger<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;height:18.55pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;

  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:18.55pt'>

  </td>

  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:18.55pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:.7pt'>
  <td width=279 valign=top style='width:209.1pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;height:.7pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=right style='text-align:right'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=296 valign=top style='width:222.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;

  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt;
  height:.7pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:172.85pt;height:175.2pt;
 z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:left' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/j_files/image001.jpg"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=230 height=234
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/j_files/image001.jpg"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]>Woohoo
and MarcoHard are two prominent software companies. But due to the rise of
rival firms, they decided that they need to merge in order to compete with them.
For this, the management in Woohoo and MarcoHard are facing some troubles.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'>Both Woohoo and MarcoHard
maintains a hierarchy of employees. In both companies, the head of the company
is the CEO. Every other employee has exactly one immediate superior.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'>To make the merger successful,
they have to maintain exactly same hierarchy in both the companies. They
decided not to fire any of the employee. They can change the name of the
employee's post (e.g. one company has a post for Software Developer, in other company
it is called Code Ninja), but they can't promote or demote anyone (e.g. they
can't make Developer a Project Manager or vice versa), nor can they break the
existing hierarchy (that is if a is an immediate superior of b, they should be
the same in the new hierarchy). But they can make new posts and hire new
employees. Now, they need to make a similar hierarchy by hiring minimum number
of employees. Since, they are people in HR, and not much familiar with
computing algorithms, they are finding it really tough to figure out how many
people to hire. So, you are asked to this job for them. And guess what, you may
be awarded a balloon if you can help them in this great dilemma. :)</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Input</h2>

<p class=Constraints style='margin-left:17.25pt;text-indent:12.5pt'>Input
starts with an integer <b><i>T</i>(</b><b><i><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span></i></b><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-family:"DejaVu Sans"'>500</span>)</b>, the number of test
cases.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:17.25pt;text-indent:12.5pt'>Each test
case contains exactly two lines, the hierarchy of WooHoo and Marcohard. Each
hierarchy description starts with an integer <b><i>N</i>(1</b><b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif";mso-bidi-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;<i>N&#8804;</i>200</span>)</b>,
the number of employees except the CEO, followed by <b><i>N</i></b> integers,
each describing the immediate superior of that employee. The CEO is identified
by 0-th employee and every other employee is identified by an integer between 1
and <b><i>N</i></b>.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:17.25pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
12.5pt'>You can assume that, the hierarchy is valid, that is every employee is
direct or indirect subordinate of the CEO and no one is a direct or indirect
superior of himself.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:17.25pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
12.5pt'>There will be a blank line before each test case.</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:16.55pt;text-indent:0in'>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.55pt'>For each test case, output the
case number, followed by the minimum number employees to hire. Both WooHoo and MarcoHard
can hire, so, this number will be the total number of new employees hired by
these two companies.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:2.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=TableContents style='margin-left:16.4pt'><b>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.25pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .25pt;
  padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO>2 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=SampleIO>4 0 0 1 1 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO>4 0 1 2 2 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=SampleIO>4 0 0 1 1 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO>4 0 0 2 2</p>
  </td>
  <td width=332 valign=top style='width:249.35pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .25pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
  solid black .25pt;mso-border-right-alt:solid black .25pt;padding:2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt 2.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 1: 4 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO>Case 2: 0 </p>
  <p class=SampleIO><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>
