<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='text-align:right'><b><span
style='font-size:17.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>A</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:48.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Argentina</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1063" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:3.05pt;width:155.95pt;
 height:197.1pt;z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=208 height=263
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/a_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1063"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>The Argentine football team
coach, the great Diego Maradona, is going to try out a new <i>formation</i>
this year. <i>Formation</i> describes how the players are positioned on the
pitch.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Instead of the conventional 4-4-2
or 4-3-3, he has opted for 5-5. This means there are 5 attackers and 5
defenders.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>You have been hired by <i>Argentina Football
Federation</i> (AFF) to write a code that will help them figure out which
players should take the attacking/defensive positions.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>Maradona has given you a list containing the names
of the 10 players who will take the field. The attacking ability and the
defensive ability of each player are also given. Your job is to figure out
which 5 players should take the attacking positions and which 5 should take the
defensive positions.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>The rules that need to be followed to make the
decision are:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<ul style='margin-top:0in' type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:10.0pt;text-align:justify;mso-list:
     l17 level1 lfo34'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>The
     sum of the attacking abilities of the 5 attackers needs to be maximized<o:p></o:p></span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:10.0pt;text-align:justify;mso-list:
     l17 level1 lfo34'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>If
     there is more than one combination, maximize the sum of the defending
     abilities of the 5 defenders<o:p></o:p></span></li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:10.0pt;text-align:justify;mso-list:
     l17 level1 lfo34'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>If
     there is still more than one combination, pick the attackers that come
     lexicographically earliest.<o:p></o:p></span></li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Input<br
style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>The first line of input contains an integer <b>T</b>(<b>T</b>&lt;50)
that indicates the number of test cases. Each case contains exactly 10 lines.
The <b>i<sup>th</sup></b> line contains the name of the <b>i<sup>th</sup></b>
player followed by the attacking and defending ability of that player
respectively. The length of a players name is at most 20 and consists of
lowercase letters only. The attacking/defending abilities are integers in the
range [0, 99].<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>The output of each case contains three lines. The
first line is the case number starting from 1. The next line contains the name
of the 5 attackers in the format (A</span><sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>, A</span><sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>, A</span><sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>, A</span><sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>4</span></sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>, A</span><sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>5</span></sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>) where A</span><sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>i</span></sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'> is the name of an attacker. The next line contains
the name of the 5 defenders in the same format. The attackers and defenders
names should be printed in lexicographically ascending order. Look at the
sample for more details.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=178 valign=top style='width:133.35pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=425 valign=top style='width:318.95pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=178 valign=top style='width:133.35pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>sameezahur 20 21<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>sohelh 18 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>jaan 17 86<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>sidky 16 36<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>shamim 16 18<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>shadowcoder 12 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>muntasir 13 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>brokenarrow 16 16<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>tanaeem 20 97</span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=425 valign=top style='width:318.95pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:

  </td>

   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Colorful List Accent 2"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="73" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Colorful Grid Accent 2"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="60" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Light Shading Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="61" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Light List Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="62" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Light Grid Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="63" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Shading 1 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="64" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Shading 2 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="65" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium List 1 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="66" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium List 2 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="67" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Grid 1 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="68" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Grid 2 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="69" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Grid 3 Accent 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="70" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Dark List Accent 3"/>

<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>B</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:28.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Bafana
  Bafana</span></b><b><span style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Team
practice is very important not only for programming contest but also for
football. By team practice players can learn cooperating with team mates.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>For playing as a team improvement of passing
skill is very important. Passing is a great way of getting the ball upfield and
reduces the risk of giving the ball away.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Carlos
Alberto Parreira, the coach of Bafana Bafana, also wants his players to
practice passing a lot. Thats why, while in the training camp for soccer world
cup 2010, every day he asks all of the players who are present in practice to
stand in a circle and practice passing. If <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>
players are in practice, he gives each of the players a distinct number from 1
to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>, and asks them to stand
sequentially, so that player 2 will stand in right side of player 1 and player
3 will stand in right side of player 2, and so on. As they are in a circle,
player 1 will stand right to player N.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
rule of passing practice is, Parreira will give the ball to player <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b>, and practice will start. Practice
will come to an end after <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>P</b> passes.
In each pass, a player will give the ball to his partner who is in his
immediate right side. After <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>P</b>
passes, the player who owns the ball at that moment will give the ball back to
Parreira.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Parreira
wants to be ensured that his players practice according the rule. So he wants a
program which will tell him which player will give him the ball back. So after
taking the ball from the same person he can be happy that, the players play
according to the rules. Otherwise he will ask them to start from beginning. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:16.55pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Input</span></b><br>
<span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Input starts with an integer <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>T </span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>(<b>T</b> &lt;= 1000)</span>, the number of
test cases. Each test case will contain three integers, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b> (2 &lt;= <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> &lt;= 23), <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b> (1 &lt;= <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>K</b> &lt;= <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>), <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>P</b>(1&lt;=<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>P</b>&lt;=200).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>For each test case, output
a single line giving the case number followed by the Bafana player number who
will give the ball to Parreira. See sample output for exact format.</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO style='margin-left:0in;layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=SampleIO style='margin-left:0in'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>5 2 5<br>
  6 3 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  1 3</span></b><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt'>
  <p class=SampleIO style='margin-left:0in;layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=SampleIO style='margin-left:0in;layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</div>

<title>Problem C</title>

 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-unhide:no;
	mso-style-qformat:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
h1
	{mso-style-unhide:no;
	mso-style-qformat:yes;
	mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-outline-level:1;
	font-size:20.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";
	letter-spacing:3.0pt;
	mso-font-kerning:0pt;
	text-shadow:auto;
	font-weight:bold;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}
h2

ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>C</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:48.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Cheerleaders</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>In
most professional sporting events, cheerleaders play a major role in
entertaining the spectators. Their roles are substantial during breaks and
prior to start of play. The world cup soccer is no exception. Usually the
cheerleaders form a group and perform at the centre of the field. In addition
to this group, some of them are placed outside the side line so they are closer
to the spectators. The organizers would like to ensure that at least one
cheerleader is located on each of the four sides. For this problem, we will
model the playing ground as an <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M*N</b>
rectangular grid. The constraints for placing cheerleaders are described below:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst style='margin-left:1.0in;mso-add-space:auto;
text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l14 level1 lfo35'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:
Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>§<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>There should be at least one cheerleader on
each of the four sides. Note that, placing a cheerleader on a corner cell would
cover two sides simultaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-left:1.0in;mso-add-space:
auto;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l14 level1 lfo35'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:
Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>§<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>There can be at most one cheerleader in a
cell.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-left:1.0in;mso-add-space:
auto;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l14 level1 lfo35'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:
Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>§<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>All the cheerleaders available must be
assigned to a cell. That is, none of them can be left out.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpLast style='margin-left:1.0in;mso-add-space:auto;
text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-language:BN-BD;mso-no-proof:yes'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_3" o:spid="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:421.5pt;height:236.25pt;visibility:visible'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=562 height=315
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/118/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="Picture_x0020_3"><![endif]></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
organizers would like to know, how many ways they can place the cheerleaders
while maintaining the above constraints. Two placements are different, if there
is at least one cell which contains a cheerleader in one of the placement but
not in the other.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
first line of input contains a positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>T&lt;=50</b>, which denotes the number of test cases. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b> lines then follow each describing one
test case. Each case consists of three nonnegative integers, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2&lt;=M, N&lt;=20</b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K&lt;=500</b>. Here <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>M</b> is the number of rows and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>
is the number of columns in the grid. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K</b>
denotes the number of cheerleaders that must be assigned to the cells in the
grid. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>For each case of input, there will be one line of
output. It will first contain the case number followed by the number of ways to
place the cheerleaders as described earlier. Look at the sample output for
exact formatting. Note that, the numbers can be arbitrarily large. Therefore
you must output the answers modulo <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1000007</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 1.5pt double windowtext;mso-border-insidev:1.5pt double windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:21.8pt'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt;height:21.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt;
  height:21.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>Sample Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:21.8pt'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt;
  height:21.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></b><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:165.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
  text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  2 1</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  3 2</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  14.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-right:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;mso-border-left-alt:double windowtext 1.5pt;
  padding:1.45pt 5.75pt 1.45pt 5.75pt;height:21.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 0 </span></b><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 2</span></b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</div>

  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="63" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Shading 1"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="64" SemiHidden="false"

  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="66" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium List 2"/>

   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Grid 1"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="68" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Grid 2"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="69" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Medium Grid 3"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="70" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Dark List"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="71" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Colorful Shading"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="72" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Colorful List"/>
  <w:LsdException Locked="false" Priority="73" SemiHidden="false"
   UnhideWhenUsed="false" Name="Colorful Grid"/>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-priority:99;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:49.85pt'>
  <td width=111 valign=top style='width:83.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'>D</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:17.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Garamond","serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=491 style='width:368.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;border-left:none;
  mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:49.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
  "Garamond","serif"'>Dumb Eucelics' Pyramid Walk<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  bold'><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Little ant Eucelics has been given a holy task. He
is to walk from anthill Almapores to another anthill Bigopores, all on his own,
unguided by any other ant through a flat desert terrain under the scorching
heat of the sun. As if that was not enough, there is a huge pyramid structure
standing on the ground, which might force him to take a longer route. He has
therefore asked you to calculate the shortest possible distance that he must
travel in order to reach his goal, walking around or over the pyramid if
necessary.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>The pyramid has a square base on the ground. For
this problem we will use a Cartesian coordinate system with its origin on the
ground at the exact center of the base of the pyramid, while axes are drawn
such that the corners of the base square are at coordinates (-10,-10),
(-10,10), (10,10) and (10,-10).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Garamond","serif"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>The
input consists of multiple test cases. The first line of the input is an
integer <b>T</b> (</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>150), the
number of test cases. This line is followed by <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>T</span></b> more lines, each specifying a single test case. Each of
these lines specify five space-separated real numbers are in the format <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>A<sub>x</sub> A<sub>y</sub> B<sub>x</sub> B<sub>y</sub>
h</span></b>, each with at most two digits after the decimal point. The
location of Almapores and Bigopores are given by (<b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>A<sub>x</sub></span></b>, <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>A<sub>y</sub></span></b>)
and (<b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>B<sub>x</sub></span></b>, <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>B<sub>y</sub></span></b>) respectively. The
height of the pyramid is given by <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>h</span></b>.
All lengths are measured in meters. You may assume that the two anthills at
distinct locations, and none of the two anthills lie inside the pyramid. The
inputs will be such that<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>|<b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>A<sub>x</sub>|, |A<sub>y</sub>|, |B<sub>x</sub>|,
|B<sub>y</sub>|</span></b></span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>25, 0</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>h</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Liberation Serif"'>&#8804;</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>150<b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Garamond","serif"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Garamond","serif"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>You must produce a single line of output for each
input test case. Each line should be of the format Case <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>c</span></b>: <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>d</span></b>, where <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>c</span></b>
is the serial number of the case starting from 1, and <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>d</span></b> is the shortest walking
distance as asked for in the problem. Your answer will be accepted if absolute
error of your output is less than 10<sup>-6</sup>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
